Google Maps mashup of the Iles Sans Fil WiFi network in Montreal, Canada. Note: loads slowly.
Excellent visualization of current daylight and nighttime regions around the world. Use the Options bar on the right to tune the settings.
Takes a BBC Programme search and converts the results in to iCal format for use in Google Calendar.
This is a mashup that allows you to visualize geotagged resources on a map. Import your del.icio.us posts or Flickr photos, share your collections and read RSS feeds.
Multiple ways to browse random images from Flickr: all, interestingness, photostreams, groups, etc.
Explore the relationship between Flickr groups and photos with this useful groups browser.
Explore UK radio and television. Extensive search options. Uses data from BBC Backstage. Data available in multiple formats: RSS, iCal, JSON.
Intelligent agents based marketspace constantly aggregating top deals and rebates for a wide range of products.
Map of recent and archival news by country via New York Times RSS feeds and human rghts news by country via hrw.org feeds. Map also includes CIA Factbook data and Flickr images.
Subscribe to a Flickr page, getting email notifications whenever you upload new photos.
Very interesting mashup technique from Microsoft Research, MSR. Shows how any type of map image data can be layered on top of a Virtual Earth map. This example with bike trail maps.
Provides detailed map of all US zip codes, powered by google map.
A Flash hybrid of Flickr and Google Maps. Worldwide photos mapped.
Apartment rental service with reviews by renters for renters. Search by zip code, see pricing reports, and comparison of ratings on noise, parking, safety, etc.
This creation tool targets those who want to create their Google maps mashups and host the HTML pages on their web servers. You own the files you have created.

RDF Calendar, which is a typical Events handling application, now supports Google Calendar API. It can retrieve events information from Google Calendar, eventful, and upcoming.org, can can map events.
LoveInns is a Bed and Breakfast locator. Search by location or by a region to drill down. It also has gift certificates, a shopping cart, my favorites and other features.
Very good, up-to-date gas price search with Google Maps station display.
Golf course and hotel locator for Myrtle Beach. Good coverage of the area. Warning: loads slowly.
FIFA, World Cup Soccer 2006 map. Latest team news via Yahoo FIFA 2006 World Cup Soccer RSS feeds and Goolge News feeds.

Auction XVCD searches the item information through the eBay API and create a single chart. On the chart, the X axis represents the end time of the items in the auction, and the Y axis represents the price of the items. Requires xfy desktop tools.
Local Alerts, Local News, Yahoo Traffic, Google Maps, NOAA Weather mashup. Alert mashup includes CERT, earthquakes, tsunamis, Avian flu...

A map of homicide locations in New York City from 2003-05. Includes date, address, motive, victim description, and suspect description. Published on NYTimes.com on April 28, 2006. Data is from the New York City Police Department.
Online map application in which you can do a virtual tour of the earth with other online buddies. You can see where they are wandering and have have IM chats with them.
Sophisticated home valuation tools. 65 million listings. Extensive data on comprables, many search and sort options.
Comprehensive real estate service: home search, valuation tools, how-to guides, and agent finder.
New York City greenways, bike paths and bike lanes plotted on Google Maps.
Mashup of a popular online sudoku player and Flickr. Sudoku player courtesy sudoku.com.au.
Explore relationship between artists. Idea based on six degrees theory: no artist is separated from another by more than six other artists. 3rd place winner in Amazon developer contest.
Top Business Schools in US as reported in US News and World Report: GMAT Score, Avg Tuition, Avg Salary.
Online image editor with basic editing features and Flickr integration.
See casinos and other places to legally play live poker on a map. Find the closest rooms sorted by distance, get driving directions and the casino web site.
Learn about the unknown hazards around you - the toxins you may be breathing. PlanetHazard maps over 86,000 companies throughout the US that emit hazardous air pollutants. Excellent mashup.
Map of the top US medical schools are reported by US News. Pop-up markers show MCAT scores and average tuition.
Great way to find Flickr photos by color. Select colors diretly or use the slider to adjust lightness and darkness. By Jim Bumgardner.

MapGameDay.com is a community site that allows fans to create map markers to show popular campus locations and create custom game day maps: ticket locations, parking, tailgate party, stadium photos, etc.
BillBiter UK is a simple Amazon custom storefront.
Get local news for your zip code with this mashup of Google Maps + Yahoo Geocoding + Google News RSS Feeds.
Enter 2 or 3 addresses and find centrally located restaurants to them. Marker popups include address and phone number info.
Odd and funny street names charted.
Make your own directions with Route Builder. Begin by navigating to the start of your route, click a point to start, the click others to get total distance.

mashup_name: Old UK Maps Scans on Google
mashup_desc: A set of old, 1 inch to the mile, out of copyright, UK Ordinance Survery maps displayed on custom Google Maps. An overlay is provided so you can compare then and now. Coverage as of April 2006 is approx 20 percent of England and Wales.
A commercial MySQL database of zip code boundary data. Demo allows entry of a zip code with boundary plotted on a Google Map. Data available for purchase, rates on main page.
This useful mashup helps you find good quality, free online course material from schools worldwide including Harvard and MIT. Both video and audio content available.
Create photo slideshows with music. Site allows you to add Flash to flickr, myspace, xanga, and Blogger
A meta site bringing in the latest funny things people have overheard from a range of sites into one place, along with relevant images and blog links.
Adictive photo puzzle game. Match two pictures that have something in common in the picture. Your goal is to match the photos that have these tags in common. Harder than it seems.
VCarious is a community-based travel portal.  Explore the world via dynamic travel guides, create journals, upload photos, and use other social features.

NCAA Mens Basketball Championship on Google Maps. Includes locations of Winners, Losers, Venue.  History of the Championship games from 1939-Present. Many ways to search and sort including  year, highest or lowest Score, nail biters, and  widest margin.
Mashes Google Toolbar Buttons with Wikipedia, Yahoo News and Google Search to provide extra info, news and search.

rendalicious is a near real-time view of website popularity trends as reflected by the del.icio.us social bookmarking service. All URLs posted by a minimum of two people in past sixty minutes are displayed, ranked by the total number of recent posts.
Comprehensive map of UK schools with comparisons of student scores and search capabilities. Marker drill-down brings you to Dept of Education and Skills site details.

Oishii is kind of a del.icio.us mini-zeitgeist. oishii: ephemeral pheromonal del.icio.us-ness. It polls the del.icio.us front page every 5 minutes, and returns all sites bookmarked by at least 30 people.
Drag and drop DVDs recommendations. You put them into buckets for those you love, hate, or have not seen. Then based on your choices the site makes recommendations to you.
Good map of the Boston Subway system with detailed marker popups.
Browse Boston brunch choices via Google Map.
Select your starting and ending locations, then this application will show you the tube route.
Content discovery using the Yahoo content analysis API to figure out what a given page is about and then APIs from Yahoo! News, Technorati, Delicious, and Flickr to find related content.
Fun way to turn Creative Commons licensed pictures from Flickr into digital postcards.
Interesting combination of Google Maps with elevation data to show the impact of rising sea levels. Try it for your own town.
Geocode addresses in bulk, plot multiple locations to a single map. Built using Yahoo Maps and Yahoo Geocoding API.
Follow the progress of CBS television show The Amazing Race via the Goolge Map mashup.
An online image editor that integrates nicely with Flickr.

Private intranet and outward facing website for the community living at the former Hartley Jam Factory, London. This website gives local residents a web presence of their own and aggregates all resident blogs into a jam-factory-specific portal.

Combines the del.icio.us online bookmarking service with Google Mobile. This allows you to browse through mobilized versions of your del.icio.us bookmarks from your phone browser or other limited-display browsers
Birth Cities of Oscar winning Best Actors and Actresses mapped out on Google Maps. Covers from 1928 to present.

mashup_name: Where I Had My First Kiss
mashup_desc: Share your fondest or worst memories of your first kiss on this community and mapping site. Top level map shows most recently added kiss locations on a world map.
User driven search where users contribute listings, reviews, pictures, tags, and more. Toronto is first city setup, includes mapped traffic conditions.
A meta-search engine using tagging services such as RawSugar, delicious, and Technorat
Content based visual image search application for Flickr. Look for an image you like, then Find Similar photos either by subject matter mode or color and texture mode.
Compare book prices before you buy with this handy multiple book price comparison service. You can even feed it your wishlist and get comparisons on them all automatically.
Podcast transcript search and transcription service built using the Amazon Mechanical Turk API.

Popular urls to the latest web buzz. Combines over 15 concensus filters into a one-page view. Good looking, Ajax-ish interface. Includes Digg, Flickr, BoingBoing, NewsVine, del.icio.us, Reddit and others.

Track your packages with Google Maps and RSS feeds!  Track UPS, FedEx, USPS, and DHL. PackageMapping.com really works and is free to the public. See where your package is as it makes its way across the map. Check it out and bookmark it!
Bookmark the world from your mobile phone. It is Sharewhere.
The Weekend Warrior Hike Finder for Los Angeles and surrounding areas. Warning, can load slowly.

Doctor Who - unlike Star Trek which always used the same rock for its location filming - was surprisingly varied in its choice of quarries. This mashup shows where they are all and includes a kml for Google Earth.
Extremely basic street-to-GMaps lookup for Ireland.  Proof of concept only.  Uses Lycos Route Planner for geocoding to street level only.
Uses the Amazon API and an Ajax-style UI to retrieve CD/DVD covers from the Amazon catalog. The second version of Albumart.org adds music, video, and lyric search, in addition to albumart search.

mashup_name: Ming Campbell for MP Campaign Map
mashup_desc: Maps the speeches, messages of support and upcoming meetings, from www.flocktogether.org.uk, of Ming Campbell MP, candidate to lead the UK Liberal Democrats.
Displays Google search terms in a tag cloud. Uses Yahoo Term Extraction API to group terms together. Greasemonkey script available.
See locations of the venues for the 2006 events with good links to details from the official Olympics site. From Remo Madella.
A cool blend of digg.com and del.ico.us  See live updates of what is being dugg and what is being linked.
Upcomingscrobbler brings together Last.fm and Upcoming.org to tell you where you can see your favourite bands perform live.

If you ever had problems ordering camera supplies from a vendor in NYC, then this map might be of interest. It plots the locations, along with photos and comments, of dozens of vendors. Not always reputable ones.
Search through MLS listings in the SF Bay Area via this Google Maps mashup.
TagCloud is an automated Folksonomy tool that searches RSS feeds you specify, extracts keywords and ranks them via font size in a visual cloud.
Puts Skype Presence icons on a Google Map. From Japan thus can be slow in US.
Slick podcast app that combines band event data from Eventful with MP3 tracks. Type in a city, get MP3s, discover a band you like, and go see them.
Mashup of events from Upcoming.org with local parking facilities. Advanced reservations are also possible at some locations.
Windsurfing and Kitesurfing locations around the world, using a Google Map as the index for a Wiki.
A do-it-yourself Goolge Maps site. You can create maps, upload photos, add comments and ratings. Explore maps created by other users.
usicmap is a visual music search tool for finding the albums similar to the ones you know.
The TurnHere video service chronicles different neighborhoods and places across the country through the use of Internet video films. This map plots their locations.
Desktop application for managing photos on the Smugmug service.
Mac desktop application for batch uploading of files to various photo services including Flickr, Smugmug, and Textamerica.
Windows desktop application for managing photo scrapbooks. With photo service upload capabilities.
The eMiniMall advertising banners are built on top of the shopping.com APIs.
Nearly 200 Hindu temples in America on Google Maps. The site title, Stuladarshanam, means birds eye view in Sanskrit.
A Google Maps interface to a database of thousands of hang gliding and paragliding sites around the world, with a feed to show the same in Google Earth.
Innovative prototype for exploring Flickr photos. Point the application at a feed, like CNN, it then renders the news in photos by matching tagged photos to words from the news.
A travel blog where travellers can create blogs about their journeys and map their travels.
Use this comprehensive index from HDTV Magazine to find television stations broadcasting in HDTV for all major US markets. Map gives details by station including power information.
Wiki and mapping site allowing scuba divers to share their favorite dive sites and advice. Good interface.
Worldwide vacation rental listings direct from owners.
This nice graphing application shows you the count of del.icio.us tags applied to a given URL over time. By Terrell Russell.
Compares all 6 Amazon international stores, adds shipping to the user country, using user local currency, as updated daily using a webservice, and keeps a price evolution chart.
A lightweight Flickr viewer. You can search and browse photos by users, contacts, photosets, tags, or groups. If the photo is geotagged, it can also be mapped.

Novel use of Yahoo Image Search to test your memory. Type in a search term and 28 tiles appear. Click on tile to see an image and as quickly as possible find the tile with matching image. From Nisse Bryngfors.
Map of Ireland with drink prices, parking spaces and petrol prices.
Surf predictions and forecasts for surfing spots across the globe. Use the Google Maps interface to get a surf forecast for a coastal prediction.
Generate money on your website or blog with MotionMall's service. Allows you to customize banner ads for your target audience and displays bestselling products using the Amazon API.
This page answers the question: Where can I go for under a certain amount of money? It displays airfares under a user defined amount of money on a Google map.

Book trends for publishers using the Amazon API. Retrieves current and historic sales rank data for Amazon book titles, displaying trends in graphic and numeric form for each analysis and decision making.
Resource for hikers that combines Amazon product data with online resources for camping and trail information.
News, pictures, music, videos and gossip about your favorite celebrity. Built on Amazon, eBay, Wikipedia, and Yahoo Search.
Compares relative popularity of spellings or concepts based on web frequency. An experiment in sidesifting the Web for useful patterns of information.
Find public libraries in the US and Canada. Data for more than 20,000 libraries available. Choose Yahoo or Google Maps.
A mashup of Google Maps, geocoder.us, and over 800,000 street level photos arranged by latitude and longitude. Very nice Crusin Mode simulates driving down a given street.
Find drink places in the greater Portland, Oregon and Seattle, Washington areas. Includes good listings of brewpubs and vineyards.
View the source location of various podcasts. US and international podcasts listed.
See the path of your network connection using traceroute and this mapping tool. Uses Java applet.
A guide to Bed and Breakfasts that makes extensive use of Google Maps.
Good interactive map of the Washington DC Metrorail.

A prediction market for Amazon products. Each new product added becomes a "stock". If a product's Amazon's sales rank improves, its stock price goes up. And vice-versa. Traders buy, sell, short, and cover.

This is a Google map of unprotected/open camera streams obtained from Google searches. The IP addresses for each camera's url has been mapped to its Geo-location. Sometimes loads slowly. Some cams NSFW.
A flight planning tool for pilots based on Google Maps. Shows airports near your current location, with colour coding for weather conditions reported in METARs, as well as TFR outlines.
Build a Virtual Pin Map of the places you've been.
Data Mining 101: Finding Subversives with Amazon Wishlists, demonstrates how your wishlists might be used by government agencies to profile you based on the books you read. By Tom Owad.
This nice del.icio.us enhancement allows you to see which of your del.icio.us bookmarks are used most frequently. By DeWitt Clinton.
Platial enables people to find, create and use meaningful maps of Places that matter to them.
Rental property statistics for major metropolitan areas.
Comparison shopping site with deal, rebate and coupon information. Customer reviews and product information from Amazon.com and Epinions.com.
Map of wine shops in New York City. With brief summaries and links to their web sites.

Helps shoppers capitalize on price guarantees on recent purchases. Add your purchase information and they will watch for price decreases and automatically notify you if price falls below your purchase price.
Maps of breweries and bars across the US. With city-specific maps and directories.
Full MLS real estate listings using Google Maps. As of October 2006 also offers data provided by the Zillow API.
A contributor-based wiki for things to do and places to goin and around Boston.
View eBay auctions on a Google Map. Enter search keywords and a zip code to find local auctions.
Appraise your Seattle-area house by seeing prices of recent home sales plotted on this Google Map.
A virtual tour of New York City using AJAX and Google Maps. Navigate through the streets of New York using thousands of pictures, viewing hundreds of descriptions and details on history.
Real time Google maps of current parking availability in the San Francisco Bay Area.

PackageMapper shows you a map of your FedEx, UPS, USPS package routes. Enter a carrier and a tracking number to see your package's progress plotted on the map. Sign in to enter a list of packages and see their current locations on a table or map.
Apartment listings in NYC with Google Maps.
Gothamist Maps are a great way to see what is going on and where right now in NYC.
Click on two points on the NYC Google Map and the program will display the shortest subway route between those two points, including walking time.
Very nice map featuring locations of photos from the book Birds of Central Park.
A website plagiarism search tool that uses the Google Search API.
Displays volcanos of the world on a Google Map.  Data from the Smithsonian Institution, Global Vulcanism Project
See the location of elaborate Christmas lights displays. Readers can add comments and vote for favorites.

This mashup uses 2000 Census data and Google Maps. Each zip is color coded by population density.  Adding a lot of cities to the map makes it resemble election results. There's also a search function to see where your hometown ranks with other cities.
UK site with Google Maps to help find dine-in and takeaway food. Menus and readers reviews online to peruse.
Find beer and more with this comprehensive listing and map of retail establishments in Toronto and the rest of Ontario.

School Performance Maps provides a bird's eye view of public school performance in California. Data from California Department of Education, Academic Performance Index. The 1-10 is statewide rank school, low to high.
Google Map of the London Underground.
50 random World Heritage Sites on a Google Map. Each time you reload it shows another 50 random sites. With embedded photos and links to details on each site.
A service that calls you on your cell phone so you can bid and win eBay auctions in the last 3 minutes.
View reviews of stores, restaurants, bars and venues placed in context on a Google Map.
Mashup of Google Map and Yahoo RSS Feeds
Geology.com uses Google Maps satellite images for exploring several of earth's meteor impact craters.
Uses the Amazon E-Commerce API to create a clean, simple interface to the Amazon catalog.
PHP source code for combining Salesforce.com and Google Maps. Note: suitable only if you are a Salesforce customer.
Fun game where you have to guess which WashingtonPost arts and entertainment story images came from which categories. From Adam DuVander.
Online tool to generate code for Google and Yahoo maps. Does not required knowledge of the APIs or JavaScript. Share your own maps and explore maps created by others.

Geo!Suggest = Yahoo Geocoding API + AJAX.
Geo!Suggest, an AJAX interface for the Yahoo! Maps Geocoding API showcases how flexible the Yahoo! Geocoding API is in working with limited input and returning results with floating response level. Source code of
Flash-based interface to Google Talk. Allows you to chat without a client install. Gtalkr also has its own API.
HYDESim maps the potential effects of radii generated by a ground-level nuclear detonation.
Comprehensive searchable gazeteer based on Google Maps. Referenc guide has full world coverage.
Listing of UK pubs with reviews and ability to have a Google Map generated based a city with starting and ending bars.
Example Yahoo! Map with overlay of Local and Traffic information. With link to article on how this was programmed. By Dan Theurer.
Mashup of Google Maps and Southern California high tech and startup venture funding.
Mashup of Google Maps and Rocky Mountain venture capital investments
Allows runners to create and save custom running routes.
Plots shapefiles on Virtual Earth maps.
Streampad allows you to stream music from your home machine to any web browser. Mashups include - del.icio.us, google maps, amazon, and the live music archive.
Find out what time around the world using Google Maps.
National sex offender registry.
Map your running routes and where to run.
Real-time, worldwide earthquake list for the past 7 days on Flash-based Yahoo Map.
Sophisticated Broadway show mashup lets you see where shows are playing and has times, pricing, tickets, directions, parking and hotel information.
Interesting mashup is a test of E O Wilson’s idea of a web page for each species. From Glasgow-based Roderic Page.
A search service that builds on the Yahoo Search API with a community and social focus. Can be embedded into any web site.
Use a Google Map to find NYC drink specials by neighborhood and day.
For the city that neve sleeps use this Google Map to find 24-hour delis, drug stores, groceries and other shops. (Slow to load)
Spain used cars dealers. To see a map click on any province and select &quotMapa de Vendedores&quot.
The Charlottetown Transit Map is a PHP and JavaScript application that uses Google Maps to display up-to-the-minute information about the buses in Charlottetown. From Peter Rukavina.
Google Map of historic locations in US cities. Initially in Philadelphia and Washington D.C.

This is a Google Maps app that displays Yahoo! Simple Maps files. It implements all of Yahoo!'s enhancements to GeoRSS, including address geocoding, plus a couple of things from basic RSS that Yahoo! missed. Use with your own GeoRSS and Yahoo Maps.
Lets you search for flights and see the current location plotted on a Google Map.
Leverages a database of 117,000 cell phone tower locations and Google Maps to help you see where coverage is and isn't.
Keep to your kosher diet with this handy Google Maps mashup.
Visualize the San Francisco Bart transit system. Map lets you click on a station and get the next few departures.
A Google Map for when you need to find a taco truck in Seattle.
Shows you where 1661 hot springs are in the US through NOAA data + Google Maps.
Shows the NYC subway system on a Google Map.
Lets you see where scenes from famous (and not-so-famous) movies have been shot in NYC.
Get the weather via this all-Yahoo! mashup.
Interesting application, or hack as author Premshree Pillai says, that shows you sites close to a given URL. Go to GeoURL.org for more examples.
Enter a zip code when you do a Jobster job search and see the locations plotted on a Google Map.
See in real time what's going wrong in Seattle with this great mashup of Google Maps and seattle.gov. By John Eberly.
See the course of the 2005 NYC Marathon. From Brian Timoney.
Links you to pizzeria reviews at America’s Favorite Pizza Weblog. With fun slice-shaped map markers.
Google Maps mashup helps you find where the hippest hangouts are in Williamsburg Brooklyn.
Live eBay Real Estate listings with Google Maps. Includes USA Top 100 Bid Count List, along with regional Top 50 Lists.
Uses Google and Yahoo APIs to extract microcontent from multiple sites and allows you to rearrange the excerpts.
Social bookmarking and folksonomies for Google Maps
Display your Amazon wishlist, listmania list or marketplace seller list on your website.
Interactively see zip code, city, and county regions plotted onto a Google Map. Also features a reverse geocoder to find the closest addresses to a certain location.
The EVDB (now Eventful) API combined with MS MapPoint creates a mini-map (Feedmap) showing bloggers and events nearby a particular blogger.
Keep up with the lastest UFO sightings with this combination of Google Maps and data from the National UFO Reporting Center.
Lets you find premiership soccer news by team location. Via Google Maps and BBC Backstage data.
Travel advisories in the UK on a Google Map (with BBC Backstage data).
Search real estate listings at Trulia and see them plotted on Google Maps.

A housing listings website for all cities of the world. It uses Google Maps to facilitate locating the offers, and RapLeaf to help to create the required trust for transactions to occur. It lets you search graphically by area, even across cities.
An Amazon AWS site. Has SMS feature, library lookups, bios, images, clips, sales rank tracking, reviews and more. Allows price comparison by SMS too.
Streampad allows you to stream music from your home machine to any internet connected machine. Uses Google maps to display where people are listening and Amazon to display album covers.
Up to 2 Gb to share geolocated photos.
Tour Nanaimo British Columbia with photos plotted on a Google Map.
Amazon and eBay product search and price comparison.
Backpack Dashboard Widget for Mac OS X 10.4.
Flickr screensaver for Windows XP
Mashup of EVDB event data and Google Maps, with nice calendar browser for paging through search results.
Display flickr photos for your Tivo

Mashup of Amazon (for album/book details), Audioscrobbler (for related artists), Flickr (for tagged photos), del.icio.us (for tagged links), Blogdigger (for media files) and Feedster (for matching weblog posts).
Jeremy Keith combines a variety of personal information from across the web in one place via Ajax scripting and the APIs from Upcoming.org, Flickr, Amazon, and Del.icio.us.
Online invoicing service that uses PayPal API.
Ajax-style prototype for an alternative web-based rich UI for del.icio.us
Automated photo mosaics using Flickr
From the site: Bus Monster is a mashup of Google Maps, King Country Trip Planner, and University of Washington's ITS Web Services, with a touch more added in.
Uses the ESV Bible Web Service to display passages relating to a topic.
The prototypical mashup: Google Maps + Craigslist to create a visual housing search page via dynamic overlays of Craigslist home listings on Google Maps.
Zoomable mashup of Google Maps, Virtual Earth and other satellite imagery through a Flash application. Try rotating the compass or building a permanent link to a location.
Google maps and Celebrity web data combined to see exactly where your favorite celebrity lives.
Plots auto listings on their map location (Google + eBay).
A freely browsable database of crimes reported in Chicago overlaid onto Google Maps.
Alternative interface to Amazon. Primarily via Amazon AWS, also incorporates del.icio.us, GMail, DropCash, Blogger and a library lookup.
Combines popular items from Flickr, Del.icio.us, furl, and Yahoo News.
ugmug photos overlaid on top of Google Maps.
Habitamos Maps combines postings from Habitamos with Google Maps satellite pictures to show a houses and apartments for sale or to rent (Spain). Warning: slow from US.
Utilizing Google Maps + AJAX + Lots of Restaurants
PervWatch.org makes it easy for anyone to quickly find sex offenders in a graphical way. (Data availability varies by state.)
Dropcash allows you to setup campaigns to raise money (charity, a trip, gift, etc). Service uses TypeKey for user management and PayPal for handling your funds.
Find doctors in the Berkeley CA area via very useful mashup of the Yahoo Maps API + screen scraped healthcare provider information.
Fitness facility locator that shows gyms, athletic clubs, pilates studios, and other similar places on a Google Map.
NYC Live Traffic Cams, Yahoo Traffic News, Flickr images, del.icio.us links, and A9 Blockview Photos.
Uses the InterFAX SendfaxEx method to send a binary file such as Microsoft Word or Acrobat PDF to any fax number.
Seattle real estate profiles plotted on Google Maps.
Combines home sales data with Google maps.
See where the latest news is happening in the UK.
Play a variation of the classic game Risk on a Google Map. Note: As of Dec 1, 2005 this has been shut down at the request of Hasbro Inc.
Test your knowledge of US landmarks with interactive, timer-based Google Maps game.
Shows locations of speed traffic camera locations in the UK. As noted on the site: this map is not intended to encourage speeding. Of course not.
See George W's life history plotted on this Google Map.
If you need a pint in Folkestone UK this Google Map can help you find the right pub.
Google Map of earthquakes worldwide within the past seven days.
City of Chicago bicycle route data, on Google Maps
View the locations of over 27,000 major fast food chain restaurants, overlaid on the Google Maps API.

Great use of the Amazon toolkit by Jim Bumgardner to combine hundreds of similar Amazon product images merged into a single interactive page. You can buy from here or use his banners in your own site.
The latest worldwide stories from the Washington Post plotted on a Google Maps satellite image.
Good use of Yahoo! Maps + Flickr to show CalTrain route and schedule data with station photos.
Predict Alexa rankings in this stock market simulation game.
A visually rich application that combines the Amazon API to show the relationship between movies, bands, actors, etc. You can go straight from interacting to making purchases.
Bay API application the gives fast Flash-based search results on a map but is useful for being more search than map. Sliders above map show items on criteria such a price, bids, time, and distance.
Google maps and a "shout" site that has a "Roaming geek", find the Geek and shout any message you want on any location on the map.
Job search site that will plot job locations on a Google Map.
Flickr photos + Yahoo! Maps. Click on a city to see your Flickr contacts and then hover over icons to get details.

A simple mashup that plots stories from the AP National News RSS feed on a Google Map.  The Yahoo! Geocode API is used to convert the location of each story to a longitude/latitude point.  Currently, only the U.S./National news stories are plotted.
View the lines and stops of the metro system in Naples, Italy.
Save on shipping with this Yahoo Maps + eBay mashup to show auctions within your local zip code.
Musipedia, The Open Music Encyclopedia, uses Amazon Alexa to provide the ability to search the web by melody. Give the engine a keyword or melodic contour, and it returns similar music.
Online running log service with local search and sharing using Google maps. Running log has nice graphing features.
Meta search tool from a group of students at Allegheny College. Results from many search engines and social services.
Database of over 11,000 airfields and airports across the world, from major internationals like New York, Paris and London to more out-of the way airstrips like Antartica.
Real estate listings from eBay plotted on a Google Map.
Mapping community site that lets users create and save maps consisting of waypoints and routes.
Amazon books combined with Windows Live Local. It allows users to find books on Amazon based upon geographical locations around the world.
This Google Map shows the path of solar eclipses across Earth’s surface. The northern and southern limits of a solar eclipse path are plotted in pink while the central line is blue.
Comprehensive NYC real estate search site. Includes data on public school information, market data, stats and trends, details about neighbors and neighborhoods, building and neighborhood photos.
For history buffs and school kids, a mashup showing where presidents/first ladies were born. From George Washington through George Bush.
Washington DC real estate & Google Maps mashup maps vacant property and past property sales.  Over 70,000 sales records are accessible. See what your neighbors paid.

A real estate search engine that aggregating nearly a million property listings searchable with a GoogleMap-based visual interface. Site has budding online community of buyers, sellers, and service providers.
retrievr is an experimental service which lets you search and explore in a selection of Flickr images by drawing a rough sketch. Very interesting.
Use Rollyo to roll your own search engine. Create personalized search Rolls, share them, and search others. See Rolls created celebrities and add search tools to your site.
Find the best petrol prices in Ireland via this interactive Google Map.
When you gotta go, but you want to find just the right place, then search here at Urinal.net. Lots of photos in the archive. Both US and international.
Find places to stay via this interactive map. Hotels in London, Ireland, Canada and US.

Iran Election Protest Tweets from Middle East, Europe, Eastern and Western United States
Allows you to use any of your other phones with Skype Calling Services.
Video classifieds site that connects the local community and assists sellers and buyers in making transactions via videos.
Select a few recent tweets from search results, reorder them by dragging around. and get back HTML or text results suitable for cut-and-paste.
Provides RSS and e-mail notification to follower list changes. Like Qwitter except this one works.
World Travel Guide featuring Video and pictures of, hotels, resorts and restaurants on an interactive Google Map.

A mashup adding information from last.fm, amazon, the BBC and through them Music Brainz and Wikipedia, as well as music from LazyTune and videos from Google to the Glastonbury 2009 lineup. Includes Facebook app to mark bands.
Compare LCD TV prices. The product and price data feed is pulled from the Shopping.com API.
Live traffic information for Lagos Nigeria overlaid on a map.
Translightor is a Silverlight mash-up using the Google Translator API. Source code available.
Adds the Amazon Mechanical Turk crowdsourcing capability to Joomla. It allows you to create and review HIT's for a site evaluation.
Map of Ottawa attractions, such as Parliament Hill, Royal Canadian Mint, and the Supreme Court of Canada.
Museums in Dublin displayed on a Google map.
Map of hotels in Dublin.
Attractions in Dublin Ireland mapped on a Google Map.
Shopping products from multiple stores (new and used), multiple tracking IDs, out-of-stock email alerts, and promotion and customer comments.
View the location and ranking results of the world's best universities on a map and compare the major rankings visually.
TweetTest is a collection of six mini games that use data from your and your friend’s public Tweets.
A real-time list of the most recent tweets and Flickr photos concerning beds and bedrooms. More feeds to come.
Allows you to save your Skype chat messages as text.

Cleepr is an easy way to search for music videos from your favorite artists. The result is a grid of music videos from that band shown as thumbnails, listing their rating, view count, and the title of the video.
Swedish real estate search engine.
Regime, Congress Analyzed. This is a tool for evaluating sets within the U.S Congress and then drilling down into comprehensive detail about each individual member of the Senate and House.
A smart way to browse and locate Flickr images on a large map of the world. Cruise Flickr photos, tags and people based on geotagged location. Combines the power of Google maps along with Flickr.
RSS2twitter is an RSS-to-Twitter posting application. Automatically get RSS feed entries added to Twitter. Use it for you blog or any other feed type.

Build a Twitter Search Badge in 15 Minutes. This is a case-hardened JavaScript badge that searches Twitter. Also included is a 15-slide presentation that will walk you through the full development process.
Users can Dub any YouTube video with the sound of the other video, classify them as funny, sad, action etc. View user videos and then share their creations with friends. More uses onsite.
Free PDF Ebook files search that uses Google Search.
Based on the feed of a TimesPeople user, determines the mood by performing sentiment analysis.
An interactive African tourist guide providing rich interactive content. Built using Microsoft Silverlight along with Google Maps.
Hot videos and popular music via this custom interface on top of YouTube and other sources.
A 4-in-1 search application to display (1) web search, (2) images, (3) news, and (4) video results from single query.

mashup_name: Swine Flu Tweets on Google Maps
mashup_desc: Google Maps and Twitter mashup that graphically tracks tweets on a map of the United States divided by region. The mashup shows the tweet, the tweeter, and the tweeter's location.

Allows full exploration of the Netflix catalog API (movies, people, search, autocomplete) from your browser, without having to worry about signing each call with OAuth.  Really more of a developer's tool than a mashup, but still quite fun.
A mashup using Alexa traffic rankings to present Open Directory Project links by popularity using tag clouds. Alexa's Free Top 1,000,000 Sites file is used for traffic rankings.
Any document can be stored and managed at Sosius for reference in a workspace, edited via Zoho Writer, and then sent out for signature via EchoSign, all within a Sosius workspace.

mashup_name: World Sports Team and Stadium Search
mashup_desc: Search sports teams and stadiums from around the world. View sports stadiums on satellite imagery. Get directions to sports teams and stadiums, and plot your route on Google Maps. Leagues listed include NFL, NBA, MLB, NHL, MLS, and many more.
Visualizes what's currently playing on your radio station and maps the artists to their place of residence or origin. You can also add your last.fm recently played tracks.
A mobile widget that uses the Google Translate API to convert across 10 different languages from any Nokia S60 series phone. Works with English, Chinese, Italian, French, German and others.
Job Link Directory. Does Google give you headaches? Too much non related information? This mashup gives you job sites by region.

Music followers is an twitter and idiomag mashup. It helps twitter users find other people to follow based on their music tastes. It uses the twitter search api and the idiomag api and its run on google app engine.
Puts all things about Downtown Fredericksburg, VA, on a map.
Tracks micro-trends on twitter and brand user satisfaction. See metrics visualized using Google Visualization API.
This GTalk/Jabber bot searches the dictionary meaning of any given word and gives users the power of information at their fingertips.

Post location-based messages on a map. Post to mingle, rant or rave. You can post to find someone to have a drink, play golf or watch movies with. You can post to recycle or sell your old stuff or find a job.
Watch Youtube videos while you video-chat with your friends using ooVoo.
GoodBuyNow.com offers shoppers the ability to compare new and used products and find coupons, bargains, and deals.
Visualize positive and negative sentiments on Twitter. See the distribution via Google Chart API.

A hardware mashup that triggers an 85 dB smoke alarm when a matching news story is found on the live stream of articles from the New York Times NewsWire API. Built using the Processing development platform.
Friendbinder brings together your friends from different social networks. It lets you keep track of all your friends in one place, saving you time and lets you post updates.
Anyvite is a straight-forward service for creating online invitations. Integrates APIs from Google Maps, Flickr, Plaxo, Twitter and YouTube.
Integration of the EchoSign e-signing service with digitalbucket.net.
Basketball, Fitness, Cycling, Martial Arts and Running Products. New products are added hourly from carefully selected sellers using Google Base API.
The Los Angeles Police Department created this searchable map of crimes in LA. Search by date, location or type of crime including robbery, grand theft auto, burglary and homicide.
Real time image search powered by twitter and twitpic APIs. Integrates with Tumblr too.
Bookmark sites that you want to read later. Uses the Vidoop API for login.

Health Cloud is a native iPhone client for Google Health, Google's Personal Health Record (PHR). It uses Google Health's API and the Objective-C GData libraries to let you access your health records from anywhere.
Text messaging for real estate.

Learn10 was built to help people create a daily learning habit. The ethos is simple - once you become a member of Learn10 you will automatically be sent short, daily learning tasks - such as 10 new words in a foreign language.
Google Map mashup of diamond mines as seen from space. Click through next and prev to browse through the spectacular view of diamonds mines from 30000 ft above earth.
Find and compare the prices on flights, airline tickets and hotels deals to thousands of trip vacations with the biggest travel agencies.
South America-related maps. Sophisticated map search.
Android phone software to follow people and events in real-time from multiple services. Uses data from Brightkite, Shizzow, Upcoming and others.

This is an artist explorer to research musical artists using Best Buy's Remix, Billboards, Charts, and the New York Times Articles and then lets you send an SMS message about your find to any mobile phone using Intelepeer's SMS Service.
Share code with developers through Twitter. Provided as a plugin for Eclipse (initially), use it to select a file or snippet of text in an editor and share it on Twitter.
DXPORTAL search engine built using Google's CSE technology prioritizes search results based on amateur radio websites. Also, integrated images and search based on the Yahoo API.
A SaaS solution for map apps on websites.  Geocubes clusters geo-referenced data into squares, improves the performance of the site, and presents POIs in a well-structured way.
An easy way to upload your TwitPic images to Flickr. Uses APIs from Flickr, TwitPic and Twitter.
Bookmarklet to find Flickr photos taken nearby in time and space to any geotagged Flickr photo.

mashup_name: HiDef DVD and Blue Ray Shop
mashup_desc: HiDef offers more than 150,000 titles and features both new and hard to find Blue Ray and DVD movies. HiDef showcases FilmCrave movie reviews, trailers, ratings, and other information on their website to enhance the customer experience.
Give away the junk that is cluttering up your life or find stuff you really need for free.
New York state's Contemporary Canal System educator's guide with an interactive area map. Also has directions. Was created for WCNY.

A shizzeep is a registered user of shizzow.com, a location-based social for helping you build relationships through sharing locations. This mashup lets you see where all the shizzeeps are hanging out.
Google Maps + Twitter view of Unemployed in America. Tweets split into Eastern/Western United States.
A simple job search engine.
A Brazil mashup that provides a Bahia gazetteer based on Google Maps. Create spot by users, select requested spots, link spots to web pages, and use tools for map visibility.
Find out which keywords are hot lately. This mashup combines Google Hot Trends, Yahoo BOSS Search and Yahoo BOSS Images Search API, and Technorati API.
Youtube fast search has a search and video play function on one interactive page. With drag & drop features, and playlist creation.
See how reddit comments, votes and articles are added to the homepage or subpages of reddit in a realtime stream.
Live Saab auctions across the UK. Uses car data from eBay.
Live Mercedes Benz car auctions from across the UK, covering all models of the car make in used and new car auctions, taken from the Ebay API.
Live Modified car auctions across the UK including drift cars, modified vauxhalls, supras and modified show cars.
Mashup of Google's Search APIs with Naver.com Design to provide a better Universal Search experience. Navgle.com is the love child of Google Engineering and Naver.com Design.
Shows photos taken in different places of the world using Google Maps. The photos are related to a theme, e.g. the obelisks in Rome.
Store your GPS tracks in the web server and view your private and everyone public tracks on Google Maps. Supports GPX format.
Real estate property search in Florida for the desktop. Built using Adobe AIR and Yahoo Maps.

Citizens can request service and check the status of service requests using Google Maps, Cityworks local API and ReCaptcha. Citizens can solicit a request by entering an address manually or select a location from a Google Map.

Citizens have access to planning petitions currently under review in the City of Ann Arbor via mashups that track statuses of site plans, zoning, area plans, annexations, land divisions, and special exception uses.

Local search service for all your local, business and personal needs. It has multiple business search with a single click. Also provides information about real estate, apartments, flight deals, and ATMs.
Suburbified takes ten years of the 'Living In' articles about towns around New York City and plots them on an interactive map for easy reference.

A community site that encourages residents and New Mexico visitors to share their stories and experiences in the state. Some of the photographs and images that appear are from museums and cultural institutions.
The TimesPeople gadget can be used to show the general feed of actions happening across NYTimes, or you can specify your own activity feed and see what your friends are up to.
Tweetmapper lets anyone map their twitter updates through the use of a simple hashtag, #at or #loc. You get your own map tracking your travels and can embed your map in any blog or website.

A social rating and review site for iPhone, Google Android, and Nokia apps. Allows users to post their apps, YouTube videos, screenshots, and descriptions.  A great way for developers to promote their apps.
ARSights is a Web-based tool for visualizing Google Earth 3D models using augmented reality.

LastVid.com brings together YouTube's endless collection of music videos and the power of last.fm's music discovery service. You can also search for your last.fm username to play videos for your favorite songs.
See users' public, geotagged albums on a map. You can go back and forth between albums in chronological order using the controls below the map.
An automated reading list of bestsellers created by combining the New York Times Bestsellers API and the Amazon.com API.

Compare search results of popular Translation Engines including Google Translate, Microsoft, Yahoo Babelfish and request human translations to ensure best quality. The site supports more than 21 languages.
A guide to the 1,200 artists that attending SXSW 2009.
Manymoon makes it easy to manage tasks, documents, and projects with the people you work with.
A service for rating tweets and twitters.
Watch Flickr photos on a virtual pinboard in your Web browser. You can zoom and arrange them with your mouse or play a quick puzzle.
A New York Times-built mashup that tracks the activity of elected officials in New York City. Uses the NYTimes Congress API.

Photo sharing an enormous 2-d surface. GoogleMaps-style navigation. Place, arrange, rotate, re-size images to form photo collages. Edit images in real-time with friends. Share to Facebook, Myspace, and other services.

Visualizes opportunities, leads, cases and accounts in a single interactive chart report. Allows drill-down and grouping by type, source, stage, status, industry, country, etc. Generates list reports with click-through to your salesforce.com account.
Create YouTube playlists with your favorite music or videos, import them into iTunes, share it with your friends, add them to your MySpace or Facebook.
Visualize pipeline and won sales against quota in a single chart. View the chart for the entire sales organization or for an individual user.
The CNN iReports Map, set on the Barack Obama inauguration parade route, allows readers to submit their own stories and reports from the event.
MSNBC has an interative map highlighting points of interest along parade route to the White House where he will take the oath of office. Has layers of overlaid data that can be toggled on and off.
MashSpots.com is a free service to make local search easy to use. Just click on any location on the map to get the four closest spots of the searched item.

Page updates every 5 minutes with the latest Apple news from Slashdot, Digg, Delicious, Gizmodo, Tuaw, AppleInsider, Yahoo News, Arstechnica, Cult of Mac and more.  New stories are posted on Twitter, Tumblr and identi.ca in real time.
Tweekly.fm is a mashup between last.fm and twitter. It sends a weekly tweet listing your top weekly artists with their playcounts.

If it is 1 click 2 your destiny, will you face your fate? With 1click2destiny.com you get access to hundreds of top-rated links that were suggested and voted for by thousands of active online users. Uses the Digg API.
General web directory of websites sorted by topic and listed in categories. Offers marketing opportunities to businesses and websites.

View Flickr photos Photo Album style. Photo details include description, tags, and comments. Use the arrow keys to flip through photos and spacebar to zoom in-out. Also includes slideshow playback and Search by Tag via Photo and Album tag clouds.
Google Map Mashup of Gaza Strip attack by Israel. Shows Day by Day events in Gaza and Israel and casualties of Palestinians and Israelis. Data Source from The Guardian News.
Twippr is a safe, simple way to send and receive money online, using direct private messages from your Twitter account. Accept Twippr micropayments to save Paypal fees.
Real Estate and property search engine using both Google Maps for mapping and Google Base for data.
An Adobe Flash and Adobe AIR application that uses color themes from kuler to draw patterns. It also draws at dimensions defined by the user which can be used for wallpapers etc.

A mashup developed to emulate a social networking platform for Congress. It uses over 10 APIs and links to: news, blogs, comments, bio information, voting records, campaign finance and more. PHP source code available.
Real-time tweet tracking for keywords across the world on a map. Currently tracks 250 countries and plans are to track all the major cities of the world.
Classifieds. The new Craiglook. Search all classifieds sites at once. Formerly called Craiglook.
Analyzes websites and finds related websites, showing website index stats and linkbacks. Also shows a thumbnail of the website.

VeeJay.tv is an internet service that allows you to become a VeeJay - mixup your own set of music videos and share them with your friends. You can also discover new music video content by watching sets created by other people.
A price comparison search engine.

mashup_name: Facebook Music with Last.FM and MTV
mashup_desc: Facebook app that displays all your Last.FM charts and recently purchased items from Items. Allows previewing of music and has artist profiles with Music Videos from MTV.

Google and NORAD, the North American Aerospace Defense Command, have partnered to let you track Santa and his travels from the North Pole using Google Maps and Google Earth. The Santa Tracker goes live at 6am EST on December 24th.
Comparison shopping website.

One key part missing from del.icio.us is a full-text search API. Delicious Search Exploder uses Yahoo Query Language, Pipes, and a couple of native feeds from Delicious to provide an on-page search-and-browse experience for users, tags, and sites.
Custom front-end for searching for concert tickets on eBay. Search for cheap concert tickets, VIP concert tickets, front row concert tickets and more.
A concept that can be summed up by the equation: map plus timeline equals resume. Create yours. It Uses the MIT Simile Timeline JavaScript component.

Videos are not equally funny all through their length. TubeGraph allows users to rate videos dynamically, instead of giving a final global mark. The average of different users opinions is a graph that shows the most interesting parts of the video.
Twitter 411 service lets you build your own information system, uses Twitter as a transport.
py :: visualizes the conversations on Twitter, Friendfeed, Flickr, Blogs and more. spy can listen in on the social media conversations you're interested in.
Find local poker games, poker leagues, groups and players near you on this Google Map service.
Displays information on different types of aircraft including manufacturer, date of the first flight and other information. Uses Flickr API to search and display aircraft photos.
A mashup combining the JavaScript effects ImageFlow and Highslide JS with the YouTube API. With YouFlow you can search all the YouTube videos, browse them with ImageFlow and open them with Highslide.

Ringful Push Conference will dial-in all meeting attendees automatically a few minutes before the scheduled start time. Push conference integrates instantly with Google Calendar, Outlook and all other major calendars supporting iCalendar attachments.
Get random images from a Flickr group of your choosing. Good for use in other mashups, websites or just for browsing. Mashup using Google App Engine and Flickr.
Shahi is a visual dictionary that combines Wiktionary content with Flickr and other images.

Concerts and live music recommendation engine. The site generates a list of shows that you will like based on a single liked artist or band. Location filters, rss, artist and album information make the site fun and useful.

Used to highlight countries you have visited. Supports Google Maps and Google Earth with a browser plugin. Provides an embeddable HTML code so bloggers and website owners can embed it into their site. No need to register.

Ranks phrases according to their popularity among authoritative sites. Uses Yahoo BOSS to do this and presents a tag cloud of results. The tag cloud is interactive, so you can click to drill further. Source code available.
Search eBay listings with the Auctiva Gadget. Browse listings by eBay category, check the most popular items, or do a keyword search from your Google homepage.
AskJot is a tool for analyzing web pages for keywords. Use its page analysis to find keyword links to custom search results pages that search multiple services at once for that keyword.
Shows YouTube videos of weekly top 10 Billboard music chart.

Follow a long list of celebrities that actively use Twitter to communicate with their audiences. MC Hammer, Britney Spears, Eli Manning and Borat are just a few celebrities posting on a regular basis.
Import your top-ranked Skydeck contacts when you sign up for Dial2Do.
The mashup of discogs.com and filestube.com. Find the whole discography of your favorite artist or band in seconds and download links as well.
Highly customized search engine for searching Hindi songs, with audio, video, and lyrics.
Online community whose aim is to show in pictures how the world has changed through time. In essence it is an archive of old photographs and pictures tagged by time and location on a Google Map.
Google Gadget for Eve-Online game POS monitoring. Incorporates skill training and POS fuel levels. Multiple instances can be used to track multiple accounts.

Bill clients for the time they spend on the phone. Match your cell phone calls logged in Skydeck with your clients phone numbers in FreshBooks. Log the time you spent on each call to your timesheet where it will be ready to bill your clients.

Google maps mashup combines driving directions and local search. On My Way is a useful facility for getting driving directions for a journey on Google Maps with points of interest on the way route also indicated.
Bubbles featuring the most popular art and design events in Tokyo. Built using the ArtBeat API.

mashup_name: New York Art Beat - Bubble Machine
mashup_desc: A visualization of events. Bubbles featuring the most popular art and design events in New York City. Built using the Art Beat API.

MeetWays lets you find a point of interest between two given addresses. For example, to meet a friend for lunch you can enter his and your addresses, type of restaurant and get the exact halfway point and a list of nearby restaurants.
A 3D slideshow and photo gallery widget for your Flickr and Smugmug photos. Also available in Facebook, iGoogle, and WordPress plugins
A database of quotations categorized by author and subject.  Many of the author pages also include videos from YouTube.

Social Interest is a system for connecting families with a range of publicly funded health and human service programs in California. Communities can use it to screen people for programs such as Medi-Cal, Healthy Families, local health insurance programs.
This mashup takes your top 50 artists and plays random music videos by those artists. It can go full screen and you can play your lastFM friends favorite artists too.
Find the appraised value of Orange County property using this interactive tool. View parcels and lots in detail.

Solar Boston program, a two-year, $550,000 initiative to increase the amount of solar energy in the city from   one-half megawatt today to twenty-five megawatts by 2015. Interactive Flash-based map showing the projects.
Mashes the contents of all real state agencies in Denmark and shows the user statistics on the housing market in Denmark. Shows all properties on Google Maps.
Find out the cost per game for the major league baseball teams. This widget converts a Swivel dataset into a widget through calculations and conversions.
Simulate NFL passer ratings for your favorite quarterback. See how could he have achieved a better rating. The widget uses live data from dapper.net.

Widget displays character distribution through classes, races, factions and genders for specified character name. Data is live from both EU and US World of Warcraft armory databases. US database www.wowarmory.com, EU database www.eu.wowarmory.com
This widget displays 10 most popular artists of Last.fm user. Data can be shown for all time, 1 year, 6 months, 3 months and 1 week.

See if your SUV is environmental friendly.  Data is from Swivel. Displays all 2007 SUV models and their gas economy. A funny discovery: An SUV with smaller engine is not necessarily a more environmental friendly vehicle.

TuneChimp lets you discover the best music from any artist: Listen to top tracks, learn more about them through videos, photos, bios, news, and lyrics. This mashup uses APIs including Yahoo Boss, Last.fm and Flickr.
LastGraph is a mashup that builds on last.fm API, does some number crunching, data squeezing and polarity inversion, and produces graphs for the users music history.

mashup_name: Local Area Info from Zillow Widget
mashup_desc:
See local area information for major us cities.
See the age distribution in my city, the price per square foot, and other data. Find out by looking at this widget displaying data from Zillow.com.

Bay Auction Watch lets you track your My eBay watching and bidding as price and high bidder update automatically. Watch seconds tick down and get sound alerts when outbid or before auctions close. Supports 20 international eBay sites and currencies.

All books on Microsoft Silverlight and related .NET technologies - rated and reviewed. All books by publishers: MsPress, Manning, Wrox, Apress, OReilly etc. New and Future Releases, Best-selling books, available for purchase.
5th Bar community that collects information about mobile phones, cell phone carriers, and accessories from members and sources all over the world.

ProperPint sorts through the many pubs and nightclubs in Dublin and the rest of Ireland. To further assist in your search, they offer several features, such as our Dublin Pub Map, as well as detailed reviews for each establishment.
glancemap helps you find or add you missed connection on the map, those people you randomly saw but never had the chance to talk to.

Which candidate has the strongest campaign financing? This widget calculates and compares the funds raised, spent, debt and funds remaining for Barack Obama and John McCain. Live data feed from maplight.org.

Doctor.com helps people find local doctors who accept their health insurance. Uses customized Google Maps to display search results and use Geo-Targeting to detect visitors locations so search results they initially see are relevant.
A personalized information portal from Mauritius Island which integrates Flickr and del.icio.us.
Get hurricane and tropical storm updates as RSS feeds. Uses NOAA data and Yahoo search for storm-specific news. Built with Yahoo Pipes.
This is a set of real estate tools for buyers, sellers and real estate agents. All tools integrate maps with relevant information: schools nearby, city information, street views, and other details.

Must See India is a free trip planning and travel sharing website. It provides photos and maps of tourist destinations in India by integrating with flickr and google maps. One can also share travel experiences by importing their existing travel blogs.
Search and watch free Bangla music video songs, Bangla Natoks, Bangladesh models, actors, actresses, Bangladesh movies, Bengali drama serials, Bangladesh news, TV shows, sports and more.

mashup_name: Google Hot Trends + Twitter + Google Maps
mashup_desc: Google Maps Mashup of Twitter Searches which contain keyword from Google Hot Trends.

mashup_name: US Election Polls: Votes by Strength of States
mashup_desc:
Data from: electoral-vote.com
Based on presidential election polls, the widget sums electoral votes and groups them into strong states, weak states, etc., to illustrate how much each candidate relies on weak states votes. Data from  electoral-vote.com.

Tech Video Bytes gives developers a useful educational video search application, focused on technology videos for a wide selection of software engineering platforms. AOL Video mashup contest winner. At Developer Snippets.

Use Yahoo BOSS API to search. Developer Sam Pullara says: It took 4 hours to write the initial code, 4 hours for it to go from unknown to 20 hits per second, 4 hours looking for a domain name and 4 hours to build the brand new UI.
Tianamo uses Java to plot search keywords on a dynamically-generated 3D terrain. Clicking on the terrain will let you navigate through related topics while search results are displayed on the right.
Sad tweets are grabbed from Twitter and illustrated via pictures from Flickr. Sometimes the pictures and the text are not a perfect match. Other times the matches seem profound.
A free resource for viewing, sharing, mixing and mashing maps online. Created by the UCL Centre for Advanced Spatial Analysis, you can select any number of maps to overlay and view.

SakMap is the Swiss army knife of Maps. It has a built in local services search with data available for each US city the ArcGIS geocoder identifies such as weather, photos, videos, imaging, news, wikipedia and more.
Pikter is a simple service that enables you to share photos on Twitter and-or Jaiku.
A map generator that highlights individual countries. A color picker allows you to select colors for countries.  Built using the Google Chart API.
With Akaber.com, your YouTube search result clips keep playing for you as you watch them.
Show which supermarkets are open now on a map. Integrates Yahoo Fire Eagle, Google Maps and Yahoo Geocoding.
Compare hotel prices from top hotel reservation sites. Bibirmer hotels search is a price comparison service that searches other hotel websites and compares prices. Uses the HotelsCombined API.
Search the latest news, videos, and photos.
A wizard for creating and managing customized Google maps of address lists. Also has a Facebook app for mapping your friends.
Shows the 20 cities most vulnerable to an earthquake and the possible number of deaths that may result.

Powered by the AOL Truveo Video Search XML API and the Yahoo Term Extracter, VideoClouds automatically extracts keywords from a given target HTML page and returns an eyecatching tagging system of videos to your site.
A video website that aggregates video content using the YouTube web service.

A Web-based reader for FriendFeed that displays your feed in the left frame. Web sites referenced in the feed are displayed on the right. See what your friends are linking to. AJAX interface auto-refreshes your feed. Implemented on Google App Engine.
Upload and share your GPS-Tracks. Over 13000 tracks for Mountain biking, Hiking, Biking, Climbing and others.
Youtube-powered infinitely-playing video viewer. Type in a keyword and get unlimited Youtube videos played back to you, just like regular TV. This app was built in about 8 hours.
Interactive bike routing by intersection for the city of Chicago.
This mashup shows available apartments and room shares around Research Triangle Park, NC.

StartupWarrior shows the locations of computer technology companies across the globe.
Use the map to find a startup job, explore your neighborhood, or decide where you should start your own company.
Identi.ca is a microblogging service based on the Free Software Laconica tool. Here's a prototype badge, based on Laconica RSS feeds and Yahoo Pipes.
Custom engine for YouTube, RapidShare, MegaUpload, and more.

Shopping cart and Buy Now buttons for selling downloads and goods on your site, eBay, MySpace, Google Base, CraigsList etc. using PayPal, Google Checkout, Authorize.Net, TrialPay, 2CheckOut, and ClickBank.
A novel system that can automatically read reviews and generate an accurate summary.
Find those with similar interests and also monitor the strength of your network on digg.
Satellite imagery of thousands of sports stadiums and venues from around the world. A community driven resource with stadium development news.
Apartment finding service for Chicago, The Homestead Group. Uses the Peekacity API.
Download mp3 songs and mp3 albums. Read the reviews and learn more about the music, see the YouTube videos. Also uses the Amazon e-commerce API.
Uptime monitoring service, aka the SaaS Weather Report, for Software as a Service including Google Apps, Salesforce, and Wordpress, run by an independent third party.
A community-based mp3 download and search website, providing mp3s, videos, guitar tabs, lyrics, and other resources.

An open source music library and player that organizes your music and allows you access to it online. Set up accounts for your friends to listen, and they can create their own playlists. Uses APIs from Last.fm, Lyricsfly, LyricsWiki and YouTube.
Searches videos, pictures, and lyrics.
Searches lyrics from your iGoogle page.
List of the most endangered destinations in the world, with the threats they are facing.
Map shows over 100 Australian Aboriginal Art Centres. These art centres occupy some of the most remote places in Australia.
Map of Las Vegas attractions.
Map of Edmonton, Alberta, attractions.
Map of Boston tourist attractions.
Search and find hospitals near you and find out what services they provide. Contains 6000 hospitals in the U.S.
A small web player that plays music and shows images from the web that represent the current artist.

Shows Chernoff Faces visualization to represent the impact factor data of a paper alongside Pubmed biomedical literature search results. Basically it allows you to search PubMed and have the results represented as a set of human faces.
Map of Boston colleges and universities.
Halifax, Nova Scotia, map of attractions.
Comparison shopping service with prices from many online merchants. Uses the Shopping.com API.
Provides a world tour with images, details, and videos of tourist spots that you can visit when you travel to that country.
Instant portfolio assembly on iGoogle
Foreign markets and major US sector watch list gadget for iGoogle.

Equity and advisor search and go iGoogle Gadget. Includes all traded stocks, mutual funds, exchange-traded funds ETFs, and real estate investment trusts REITs. Also includes search for Financial Advisors.

mashup_name: Bear Of The Day for iGoogle
mashup_desc: Google Gadget that displays price, quote, and fundamentals of one of the latest losing stocks.
Nightfeed.com is a social, user-driven mashup of Google Maps and Facebook designed to let friends find nightlife.
Use this PostRank Google Reader extension to bring PostRank filtering into Google Reader. View rankings for each feed and custom tweak your settings.
Web-based RSS aggregator with PostRank from aideRSS built in. Manage existing feeds, lifestream, or use it as a discovery engine with other users.
Uses Amazon API to help users filter millions of products using reviews to shortlist top products, the books, movies, electronics, computers, home items, and stuff consumers are happy about.
Store, access, and share digital files in one place, including photos, videos, music, PC files, images, and more. Also get email, home inventory software, and medical record software.
A custom web site to monitor players, games, clans, leagues and tournaments in Aevum Obscurum.
A wholesale electronics distributor. Integrates PayPal API as well as UPS and other shipping APIs.
Barack Obama 2008 Presidential Campaign Map, showing his campaign speeches and endorsements across USA.
A rendering of the public Twitter timeline. The app was built using Sharendipity, so you can take this and modify it.
Google search meets DOS shell, in a browser. If you miss command lines, then this app is for you. Feel right at home searching the Web from a shell prompt.
Create a Map of your favorite places, travels or destinations. Start a Community map where everyone can add Locations, Pics and Videos. Share your Map with your friends or the whole world.
Search for a place or browse the map to find Wikipedia articles and videos associated with that location.
Google map of the journey of John McCain from his birth place in Panama Canal Zone to possibly the White House.
Search major video sharing sites and watch videos. Uses APIs from Blip.tv, LiveVideo, Vimeo, YouTube and others.
The Skymap is a new application that uses GPS-enabled mobile devices to display the current sky at the users current location. WHERE mashup contest winner.
WHERE contest winner. Voice notes tied to a location. Record private or public location voice notes on your cell phone then listen to them on the web or publish them on Twitter.

The Independent Film Channel is the first channel entirely dedicated to presenting independent film, unedited and commercially uninterrupted 24 hours a day. IFC has integrated the Userplane APIs as part of their social platform.

An application that uses Flash to explore Flickr photos via virtual 3D planetary systems. Enter a tag, and the related galaxy appears on screen. When you click on a sun, the images are placed on a 3D rotating globe.
Allows you to take a Twitter tweet to Tumblr or embed in other pages/blogs, or send to email. tweetshots are tweet screenshots, automated.
Share Pownce on Facebook. rePownce publishes your Pownce notes to your Facebook profile, feeds, and status. You can also post notes from rePownce.

IM Whiteboard is an AOL AIM plugin that let you draw simultaneously with any of your buddies. This plugin can be useful to share an idea or have fun with your friends plus you can save your drawings and use them as wallpaper or send them to other people.
Locations in Las Vegas are plotted on the map with a small photo showing up inline and the view can be flipped to show a larger photo without the map. Uses the new Google Maps Flash API.

Free2IM is an AOL AIM plugin that help you chat with the buddies who speak languages you are very weak or even you do not know at all. It is useful for you to practice your foreign languages as well. Supports 13 languages.

IM Remote is an AOL AIM plugin that lets you share your desktop with a friend via AIM. This plugin can be extremely useful when a friend or relative needs help with their computer, avoiding the complexity to setup a secure VNC server.

Detailed map shows the average nightly rate for nearly every hotel on earth, over 70,000, in a global heat map. On the city level it also shows Restaurants, Wikipedia, Airport and Starbucks locations.

mashup_name: Map of U.S. Toxic Air Emissions
mashup_desc: Displays EPA Toxic Release Inventory data on a simple map that is searchable by city or address.

We map over 60,000 hotel locations and prices on our map. You can also view the locations of Starbucks, airports, restaurants and attractions. Use our map tools to make trip notes and share your favorite views and hotels with friends and family.

A Flex mashup of Yahoo Maps, Yahoo Local Search, Yahoo Geocoding, ESRI JavaScript API for ArcGIS REST and ESRI Geoprocess on ArcGIS online. The mashup helps determine the driving time area that covers the searched locations.
A very handy US Zip Code mapping utility.
View the map and find information about countries, states, and cities with one mouse click.

When you listen to music with Audioscrobbler, MusicRambler shows on a map images and events about the artist you are listening to. Enter your Last.FM login and then switch on Audioscrobbler. English version at www.musicrambler.org.

Analysis and sampling important keyword in a phrases while analysing contents of new text or exist text file also are able to quick approach to searching files using related with multi-media contents. Users can save the time to understanding their text.
A online store mashup with Flex user interface and built using Amazon AWS and EC2.
Compress single or multiple URL's, publish straight to your Twitter and Del.icio.us accounts, add passwords to compressed URL's. URL's can be tagged when publishing to del.icio.us.
Mashup that uses the new Flickr API video features to let you browse the newest videos on Flickr.
The BricaBox Platform is a hosted community CMS, collaboration, wiki designed for social content applications.

A demo site built to show the ease of implementing BeenVerified with IPaper. IPaper was used to display resumes, and the BeenVerified API was used to demo the OAuth process of displaying verified user data.
Visualize your Twitter. Generate a scatter using tweet data for any Twitter user. Gathered via Yahoo Pipes and rendered using the Google Chart API.
Yosle yard sale mapper. Check out all the yard sales in your area. Over 5000 sales every weekend.

Feedlr is a miniblogs mashup that polls user-submitted feeds, and posts news to multiple miniblogs. It also allows users to browse existing miniblog bots and choose to follow those that interest them.

Posty is a microblogging application which allows interacting with twitter, jaiku, pownce, tumbl, friendfeed and identi.ca. Posty enables users to browse notes, reply to friends' items and view media elements from youtube, vimeo, flickr, zooomr, smugmug.

Tracks the FriendFeed public feed to show statistics about FriendFeed. Shows data in a variety of formats in hours, days, months, or services, and allows you to drill down to a specific user or service.
Mashup of members of the Live Butterfly members.
Flash-based interface for searching for rentals and housing. Uses Craigslist and Yahoo Maps.
A social geomapped directory of more than 5.000 points of interest. Anyone is allowed to add, remove, move or rename markers.

DBpedia Mobile maps DBpedia locations and allows users to explore background information about them by navigating into DBpedia and other interlinked datasets such as GeoNames, Revyu, EuroStat and Flickr. Supports 14 languages and various filters.
Create an advanced photo calendar with your Flickr photos. It is easy to use, and there are many templates to choose from.
Google Maps can easily be customized to display grave locations. A custom cemetery map using PDF, JPG, GIS formats, can also be displayed on the map as seen in the example.
Google Maps can easily be customized to display searchable floor plans. A floor plan drawing in PDF, JPG, GIS, CAD formats, can be displayed on the map as seen in this example.
ClickPoint is a little game with OpenLayers and Google Maps. The goal of the game is to find random places on the map.
Map of March 2008 protests in Tibet, and ensuing events. With photos, summaries, and links to supporting documentation about the Tibetan Centre for Human Rights and Democracy, TCHRD, website.
A simple mashup showing interesting Flickr photos.
See all the latest twitters as they are sent.
The Mashup allows you to search for Adobe Flex developer jobs based on your Zip code. Also you can SMS a job posting to your cell phone.
Preview what every one is stumbling upon in StumbleUpon. Dynamically add or remove tabs for the tag of your interest from tag cloud.

Shows eBay items in an integrated GoogleMaps map. Calculates distances, allows sorting by distances. By clicking on an items distance, user can get directions based on his home address. Can be useful for saving shipping costs.

Interactive Travel Guide featuring 16,000+ destination guides, a full-screen interactive map, traveler reviews, videos, and 10,000+ photos. Combines Google Maps, WikiTravel, Wikipedia, Placeopedia, YouTube, and Google Video.
A local social network designed to find other local people who share your interests. Organize local activities and get local advice. It uses Google Maps to show where members live.
Find homes that are in foreclosure.
