Oamos pings search engines for up-to-date news, images, synonyms, music, and videos in relation to your topics. Meta-inspiratios engine.

JobGeni is a new job search engine aggregator that supports several languages. What it does is to grab multiple RSS data feeds in real time from job boards spanning seventeen different countries, and present the jobs it has found to the user instantly.
Rapid coding and collaboration tool that also integrates directly with the Basecamp task management service.
Take a video tour around London and add your own content to this graphically rich travel video mashup.

The history of computers, software, and information technology in a Google Gadget. Each day contains a historical reference to the people, inventions, and events that define the evolution of computers.
Track news coverage about anything and view trends on a chart. Combines the Daylife and Trendrr APIs.
Paragliding pictures and videos from Croatia, archived by date.
A music information aggregator that displays music news, album information, music videos, artists photos, music genres and tags for each artist.
Too is a full-featured file search engine that combines APIs from Google, Scribd, SlideShare, Yahoo and YouTube.
An extension for open source Mindtouch Deki Wiki platform that allows integration of Twitter data.
FlickTickr allows you to create your own scrolling ticker for your favorite Flickr feeds. It takes only two steps to create a ticker.
Site that aggregates videos of watches by brand.
Mashup that demonstrates how to use the Google Charts API with maps. Make maps with a URL.

A University project that intends to provide multiple information about places around the world making use of content retrieved from Wikipedia, Wikimedia Commons, Youtube, Google, news, and classified ads.
Shows over 100,000 pilots on a map and where they are located.

whirl is a desktop client for Twitter, based on Adobe AIR. Connect to multiple Twitter accounts, get new tweets, shorten URLs, cross-post to Pownce and Jaiku, post images to TwitPic, search tweets, and filter.
Google Maps mashup solving a transit problem: how to reach from one point to another in Moscow. This mashup can trace routes of Moscow city transport and display them on a map and in special view.
Combines Flickr, Last.fm and YouTube. Create your own folders, drag your videos, and view videos in a player.
Amazon and Twitter mashup to watch prices and availability.
By mapping information about ongoing community-led philanthropic partnerships in northern Uganda, this site helps American citizens aggregate their resources to support post-conflict transformation.
Visit this famous French city with 150 spherical panoramas.
A UK shopping comparison engine, covering Amazon UK, eBay UK, and Shopping.com UK.

A browser extension that allows you to make the web the way you want it. Enhance the pages that you are already browsing by applying mashups that enhance the page by adding extra information or visualizations.

A JavaScript-based mashup engine that runs entirely on your web browser. No software installation, no server hosting. Numerous web services are now available and mashable under this JavaScript engine.
Social mobile tracking with the iPhone on Facebook. Find iPhone-using friends near you.
Shopping comparison service with local shopping focus. Search for national products and see availability at stores near you.
Slideshow in iGoogle.
MyNeighborhood.Com is a spacially aware social networking tool that focuses on delivering georelevant content to neighborhoods in the United States.

Custom front-end for searching the Amazon Concert DVD catalog. Search for bestsellers and new releases in rock, heavy metal, rap, jazz, blues, documentaries and more, including Blu-ray high definition.
A diverse collection of real life maps contributed by map lovers worldwide. Find and explore maps by keyword, location, or simply by browsing a map.
Get lots of information about your favorite artists. View album information, find mp3 songs, lyrics, biographies, podcasts, or find a good deal in eBay. You can also rate artists and add comments.

Find commercial real estate with Coldwell Banker Commercial maps. Combines the listings of CBC with a full screen auto resizing map in the background powered by Virtual Earth. You can draw your own polygons for search as well.

mashup_name: US Taxpayer Contribution to Iraq War
mashup_desc: Mashup that combines data from the Nation Priorities Project and Google Maps to show how many billions taxpayers in each US state are paying. And where that money might otherwise be spent.
A mashup of eBay yoga clothing and gear listings plus a Google map of yoga-friendly venues, such as local classes, retreats and vacations.
Tag-based search. Watch funny videos and listen to the music player.
Kijiji is a group of local, community-based classifieds websites.
Handout is an application that allows you to upload documents to Adobe Share and then post them quickly to Pownce or Twitter.
Locations and details of more than 2000 museums and art galleries in the Netherlands, with a clean interface.
Join us as we explore some of the most awe inspiring events on Planet Earth: great animal migrations. We are asking you to contribute to the project wherever it happens.
Get the exact time and date for anywhere on earth with this search engine. Results are plotted on a map along with details on timezone, daylight savings time and other data.
Inflo collects your day-to-day information streams like email, appointments, instant messages, and news, into one unified information flow and displays it in a single browseable list.
Presenting vintage photos from Flickr in an interesting way.
Online Zune store for search, filter, and categories for Microsoft Zune and Zune accessories. Uses the Amazon and eBay APIs.

Tennis courts and tennis services in the United States organized on an interactive map. See the type and number of courts including whether they are lighted, include a backboard, have water and bathrooms available, etc.
Mashup with Google and Yahoo news feeds, blogs and widgets covering 26 categories of professional and amateur sports internationally.

This mashup shows Yahoo Live channels on a Yahoo Map. It is easier to visualize and remember the channels you were last time.

It uses Yahoo! Live, Yahoo! Maps and Yahoo! Pipes API.
Walking the rough routes of all London Underground tube lines. GPS tracks shown on Google Maps imagery, and many photos are included.
A directory of water fountains and other public water sources to help you ditch your water bottle habit. Mobile and location based information.
Find hotels, real estate, and businesses in Greece.
This program can analyze what activities you were filled with in your life. Please, recognize your own life pattern and make new and better one.
Real-time traffic and incidences of road issues in Spain, including information from fixed and mobile radar.
Generates a feed of new and upcoming music releases from the artists you scrobble on Last.fm.
Graph your Twitter stats, including Tweets per hour,    Tweets per month, and Tweet timeline.
Directory of holiday rentals, bed and breakfasts, and camp farms in France. Very useful web site for renting and reserving your holiday rental. Many choices for holiday lodging in France.

Sky Connect Mission Management Unit provides GPS tracking, satellite telephone, and text messaging capabilities in flight. Data is transferred between aircraft and Sky Connect via the 66 low-orbit satellites in the Iridium satellite network.
MapMate is a new way to update your Facebook status. You can plot your current location and set your status anywhere using Virtual Earth.
Turns your Java-enabled mobile phone or your PDA mobile phone running Windows into a personal real-time tracking solution.
Site developed to share walking and running routes.

Automatically and randomly creates a day out based on your schedule and interests. An itinerary and Virtual Earth map route are generated, including previews and links to places of interest, weather forecast, and directions.
KGI Wireless are using a combination of MSN Virtual Earth and MapPoint technology to map its wireless towers and associated profiles around the USA.
Comparison shopping and coupon website designed to maximize visitors savings. Also, features product reviews and free shipping offers.

Has Virtual Earth with new custom high-resolution images for the Horsham, UK town centre. An entire urban area that has its Virtual Earth images updated. Also has Flash to play audio and display images that are streamed on demand.

Blog Juice is a bookmarklet that looks for a MyBlogLog identifier on the current page and uses the API and 9 other services to find information about its recent readers roll.  Bookmark users for later and visit their sites, all without leaving the page.

Two far-flung people meet inbetwixt their current locations. Enter the meeting place type, a café perhaps, and you are presented with four possibilities that would allow you both to arrive at the same time.
Photoree aims to be to photos what Last.fm is to music and StumbleUpon to websites. It adapts to your preferences and taste, recommending to you the best images that may interest you.
A tool to check at-a-glance the link popularity of any site based on its ranking from Google PageRank, Alexa Rank, Technorati etc., social bookmarks like del.icio.us, subscribers on Bloglines, etc.
Share photos on Twitter with TwitPic.
Semantisize.com uses semantic technology to bring together information about semantic technology.

Comprehensive map of libraries in Denmark.

Shows head libraries = Hovedbiblioteker.
Shows public libraries = folkebiblioteker.
Shows mobile libraries = Bogbusser.
Shopping/eCommerce site built with Amazon, eBay, and PriceRunner Web services.
Heat map of solar power in California over the last decade. Year selector that allows you to see the change in solar from year to year.
A geo-broadcasting platform for users to broadcast and experience destinations around the world. Seero combines live and on-demand video with GPS mapping.
Current conditions, sunrise calendars, latitude longitude coordinates and other details for US lakes. Useful for boaters and fisherman.

Aggregates and visualizes trends on Google, Yahoo and Amazon. It is also a customizable search engine that can be added to your toolbar. Once an account is created, users can maintain a top 20 list and add web clips to their scrapbooks.
Fortune Magazine list of 10 Fascinating Googlers plotted on a Google Map.

24-hour news headlines presented in an interactive world map. Use News Flash mashup to get breaking news, current events, latest headlines, and top stories in more than 200 countries.

News Flash is available in: Arabic, English, French, and Spanish.
View popular news feeds and current Top 10 lists. Sources include del.icio.us, Digg and Magnolia.
MyKorea is a kind of a shell which can display every geospatial data concerning Korea I am interested in.
Find and rate hotties from Google Streetview.
Search for homes, get estimates for homes using Zillow, and find lenders for financing your home purchase.
Interactive chart generator with in-place Ajax display of generated charts. Now uses the Google Chart API.
20,000 European camping sites on one map.

A proof-of-concept mash-up for the MyBlogLog API, currently in limited beta. Gets current visitors for a site, queries the API for tags and user IDs on outside services, and displays current Twitter status, if one exists.
Calculate the number of calories you burn while running, bicycling, or swimming.
Dutch municipality site that has all building permit requests online.

Google search with option to save any interesting results to a temporary folder, and the folder contents refine search terms, search re-runs. Handy way to discover new things or target what you really meant.
Make an imageLoop slideshow on Facebook and show it to friends in your profile.
A Finnish flights and aviation site that uses Google Maps to show all official airports in Finland. On the detailed airport page, also view YouTube videos.
Upload and embed slideshows into your space, blog, or to Skype.
Covert a PDF into a slideshow. Then integrate with blogs, widgets or elsewhere.
Tool for integrating PowerPoint presentations into a widget for slideshows.
Create and show slideshows using the ImageLoop API.
Uses the imageLoop API to display PowerPoint slides as a slideshow.
Slideshows from your desktop photos.
A professional tool to present your images in photo-communities. Uses the imageLoop API.
Coast Rack searches for artists tracks and their videos from sources including Last.fm, MusicBrainz, and YouTube.
Friends as slideshows on your MySpace profile.
Lets people reprint public domain books from Internet Archive and Google Books.
Price Comparison from many sources including Amazon, Ebay, Half, Commission Junction, Shopzilla, Nextag, MSN, Sortprice, Google Blogs, and Google.

Compare and track the readership of popular blogs, competitors, etc. Ties together three Google services: a Google Gadget that shows FeedBurner traffic statistics using sparklines generated by the Google Chart API.
22books is dedicated to the creating, sharing, and viewing of book lists. Create your free book list and see the unique user experience when you add books to your list.

mashup_name: Life of Barack Obama on Maps
mashup_desc: Journey of Barack Obama from his birth place in Honolulu, Hawaii, to possibly the White House.
Directory that provides a wide variety of do-it-yourself tips and tutorials.
You.travel features a cool interactive full-screen map  along with travel guides to over 16,000 destinations, traveler reviews, and over 10,000 photos.
Application and map for business card sharing.

This mashup provides you with top local news around a location. This location is by default your current one based on your IP address but you can also change it by entering an administrative area including city, county or an IP adress.
App that lets you create and share individual world maps, KML-files and Google Mapplets.

Example application and source code showing how to use the Nintendo Wii to control 3D Virtual Earth maps. Take the Virtual Earth control out of the web browser, use it in a WinForms application, and control it with a Nintendo Wii Remote.

Offers a wide array of workspaces, such as practice spaces, offices, studios, single-user work stations, conference rooms, and so on that can be rented or offered for days, weeks or for permanent use. In German.
Search an item at 20 eBay country sites with one dynamic search interface.
Listing of eBay auctions of TV series that are available on DVD.
Be creative and draw a greeting for somebody you care for.
USPS, UPS, and FedEx package mapping Internet tool. Also offers RSS subscription to individual package progress and average speed between each point on a package's path.
Preview the new links at dzone.com using this Google gadget. Dynamically add or remove tabs for the tag of your interest from the tag cloud.

Tafiti demonstrates a new interface to search. It was originally created to demonstrate Microsoft Silverlight and the Windows Live Search APIs. Get the source code of this Windows Live Platform Quick Application from here http://codeplex.com/WLQuickApps

Vimasic is a VIdeos, iMAges and muSIC mashup. Saves searching on different sites for variety of useful music data: lyrics, videos, photos, biographies, concert dates and other information. 5 APIs used.

gives you all level-1, the US states, and level-2, the US counties, administrative areas the Google Maps route planner transits. Results are display as a list but also on the map for the USA and France. You can animate the route and see altitude profile.

CribQ.com adds tools and context to Craigslist rental housing listings. More than a map it adds features like birdseye views, walkability ratings, notes, and hotlists. Built using 5 APIs including Rentometer and Amazon services.
UK property search engine indexing 11,000 estate agent branches and 600,000 properties for sale.
Mapping the beautiful mountains of North America.

mashup_name: Events of the Day Around You
mashup_desc: Customized Google News for your locality. Set the location and source and add some keywords if needed, you will what is happening around you.
Penetrating, sometimes funny thoughts from great minds of the world, especially from the ancient land of wisdom, India.
Search Google, Amazon, eBay, YouTube, Facebook, Wikipedia and more, all from a single search box. Includes category defaults and quick 1-character shortcuts.
New York City apartment rentals on a searchable map with broker reviews, zoned public schools, and local restaurants.
Offers apartment rentals, vacation rentals, home rentals and other real estate rentals. Search the listings or post your rental listing. Also searches Craigslist.

The Onion satire: click on the pins scattered around the globe to reveal mind-expanding factoids about the lesser, conquerable nations of the Earth. Come back each week to learn more about how little you know.
Google Mapping ACT Scores by state in math, reading, science, and English categories.
Find attractions on a map of Belize and other Central American cities. Click the tabs at the top to watch YouTube videos related to the city.
Geolocated presentation of World stock indices daily changes (thanks to Bloomberg.com). Intraday data are at least 15 minutes delayed.
Search engine for targeting information about a country. Uses the Google Page Creator and other APIs.
Gives you overflown countries between 2 points on Earth following the great circle (it's more or less the air route).
Collaborative mapping for virtual tourists.
Collection of songs and video clips with their lyrics.
Multiple destinations-dates wrapper for Kayak flight metasearch engine.
Mallicious offers a social shopping experience that leverages real life relationships on Facebook to help consumers find online deals.
gMOVE is a migration utility for moving your Microsoft Outlook calendars, email, contacts and tasks to Google Apps and GMail. Built using the Google Apps Email Migration API.
Preview what everyone is bookmarking in del.icio.us. With this Google gadget, you can preview, add tabs, and remove tabs for the tags in the Tagcloud.
View Amazon.com book reviews geographically.
Searches eBay, Amazon, and Shopping.com in a single search. Makes related search suggestions with intelligent algorithm.
Toronto Buddhism locations. Also, view images, read news, and watch videos related to Buddhism.
View CNN Sports photos on your WAP device. In your phone browser, go to 411sync.com. Then enter keyword cnnsipic. Or enter the keyword from the Web and send it to your phone.
Searches Encarta, Wikipedia, Britannica and others using Google Custom Search.
DigitalBucket.net provides a web interface that can be used to store and retrieve data, at any time, from anywhere on the web. It uses Amazon S3 to create a remote data storage platform.
Search and find YouTube videos, watch a video, and share it with friends.
Search for golf videos, tutorials and golf courses, with each mapped.

This uses two Yahoo pipes chained together. The first searches a default list of RSS feeds for terms you provide. The results are processed and an extra link is added that calls a pipe to run a Yahoo Search to give more details about the article topic.

mashup_name: From Refugee Camps to Princeton U
mashup_desc: Google map of the journey of Abass Hassans from Somalia Refugee Camps in Kenya to Princeton University.
Dog Park USA uses Google Maps to promote the awareness of responsibly maintained public dog play areas in regional parks.
A visual mashup of different countries and states with Flickr, Google Spreadsheets, and Google Maps.
The RSS data from various news sources such as Google News and Reuters is aggregated and then displayed on a Timeline widget. Uses the MIT Simile timeline.
Free walking route descriptions with OS Landranger mapping for each walk through Multimap API. Click on View next to buy map on any route to see the Multimap API page.
Real-time polling mashup. People can ask questions and watch the answers come in real-time, with geographic locations.
QuickHotels is a Europe-wide discount hotel reservation website offering more than 30,000 hotels with discount room rates.
Lets people know the best way to get from A to B in Dublin using just the public transportation. Access over 5000 stops, with more coming. Also available in multiple languages.
Facebook application for searching, rating, reviewing, and sharing summer camps. Put your favorite camps on the map and meet other friends who share the same experiences.

Follow along as you stream KEXP, tag the songs you like, post comments, send SMS to get current song info from your phone.  As the live KEXP stream plays, the site shows album art, dj and  listener comments, and links to amazon, itunes, and rhapsody.
Online aromatherapy shop created using Shopping API. Price comparison with direct product links to stores. Aromtherapy.eu has subdomains for US, DE, FR, and AU. Main domain used for UK Shopping API.

Halter Top for Women. A fully SEO website that pulls in data from Shopzilla using their API. Can be used for UK and US. Each category page is editable and all pages have Meta titles. Easy to navigate and setup. Managed via admin panel.
Geo presents various information from the World Bank, including projects, data, news, and center location.
Find rideshare matches among craigslist rideshare ads, according to your estimated route. Uses craigslist, Google Maps, and postgres.

Primr makes it easy for members of Amazon Prime to find items eligible for free shipping. With so many items on Amazon coming from third party sellers, this tool filters out all non-prime-eligible items.
Discussing based site as long as its about any place in the world. For example, plot your local school and tell everyone what you think of it. Plot your local bar and discuss its beer prices.
Find celebrity videos, especially for Latin stars. Uses the YouTube API. Note that some videos are adult content and not safe for work, NSFW.

mashup_name: Real Time After Hours Nasdaq Quotes
mashup_desc: Get real time after hours quote from Nasdaq.com on your mobile phone using SMS, WAP or Email. Use the keyword afterhr followed by the stock symbol.
Geekish social site, permitting sharing of feeds, searches, and user posts. Uses the Flickr and YouTube APIs as well as search from Google and Yahoo.
Video and lyrics together. Learn Spanish through songs, video and lyrics. Spanish songs lyrics, French songs, Italian songs, German songs. Add and edit your favorite songs and videos

Get to know any British Member of Parliament. Select by location, postcode or name. Traversing the UK map provides a constituency grid and instant feedback of its local MP. Extra information provides anecdotal quotes and wiki entries for the local area.
Kapital Moto TV is a niche video website for quality motorcycle content. Choose a map location and watch content filmed there. This works especially well in a close Satellite view.
Shopping comparison site that uses the new Shopzilla API. This site has a user-friendly highlighting interface for product results.
Search Amazon by keyword, category, percentage off, price range, and eligibility for Prime or Super Saver Shipping. Sort results by bestsellers, featured, price, alphabetically or by customer review.

For each of the 1.95 million DBpedia concepts, the wrappr generates a collection of flickr photos that depict the concept, utilizing multilingual labels and geo-coordinates provided in Wikipedia entries.
Scheedule is a registration website that allows students to schedule for classes by showing them all of their possible schedules.
Mashes up last.fm user data with LyricWiki lyrics for a user to easily see lyrics for a song. If lyrics cannot be fetched, they can be added by the users in a wiki-like fashion.

Brings together Facebook desktop alert programs into one interface. View recent notifications, photos, an alphabetical Friend list, and receive alerts and upload photos. FizzBoost is a companion to Facebook.
Listmania cc is a collection of book lists and film lists. Listmania cc will improve the experience of browsing and reviewing all these lists.
A Google maps mash-up with popular given-name data from all around the world. Parents can use the map to find the perfect baby name, not too popular, not too obscure, just right.

Point-and-click time zone locator. Find what time and date it will be anywhere in relation to a reference location and time. Use EasyTZ to schedule conference calls and plan meetings across TimeZones.
JoLocate puts Craigslist on a map. It offers an intuitive interface, as well as more complete Craigslist listings.
With printfriendly.net service, you can create printer friendly versions of any blog and select articles to print.
Real time travel information for Leeds, UK.
Select a city and view an aggregated page of feeds from all over the Web, in addition to utilizing a few APIs. See what is happening in your city or a city that you are traveling or moving to.
A wiki where people decide which Flickr photos appear on top on the Google Map. Every zoom brings a collection of photos from that area.
View galleries of black-and-white images. You can view the images with your own tags, or browse the latest or most popular tags.
Online book management utility in an RIA format. Built with Amazon ECS and Google Base APIs.
Keep track of your income and expenses. eBay Direct Import automatically imports all of your eBay transactions every hour.
Winner of the 2007 Skype Mashup Competition. Send a fax to any fax machine in the world and easily pay with your Skype Credit. No registration needed, no pre-payment.
Lets you tour the Internet via a Skype bot.

YES is a year end summary for eBay Sellers. Get reports for 2006,  and 2007 coming soon, that provide information on your sold and bought items. Analyze your performance and see the strengths and weaknesses of your eBay business.
Zenoss Core is an open source systems management platform that monitors your whole infrastructure. Starting with version 2.1, all geographical network data is overlaid on Google Maps.
Watch new photos being uploaded to Flickr in real time. Uses Ajax.
Shaded relief mashup of the world for Google Maps. Use the drop-down lists in the top-left to view a specific element.
Add and view dead cell phone areas by carrier.

The fractal view of GeoPix shows a fractal tiled structure over an interactive map. The user controls the point of view and the scale using the map, and the system fills the tiles in the fractal view with the appropriate images.
The damage radii of each quake is displayed around each epicenter. Shows power and reach of quakes as they happen. US, European, and Australian feeds improve global coverage.
Explore the world and see pictures placed directly on the map. You can filter the pictures using the tags and click on pictures to save your favorites in an itinerary.
Sightseeing via a World Video Map. Watch and map videos on Google Maps and Google Earth.

Allows other maps to be layered over a Yahoo. Map to show additional detail of a location. Now you can mix together the detail of a point-of-interest map — such as airports, college campuses, sports arenas, historic maps and others.
Find products on Yahoo Shopping by color. This feature was initially developed as a mashup during an internal Yahoo Hack Day event in early 2007.
Advanced music videos search.
Localmouth aggregates local information for places in the UK. It provides events, property, jobs, news and other listings relevant to a given village, town or suburb.
A motorcycle finding mashup that aggregates from eBay motors, eBay, and other sources, with a Google Maps map.
A vehicle-finding mashup, aggregating from eBay motors and Craigslist with a GoogleMaps view.

mashup_name: WeoCEO for Amazon S3 and EC2
mashup_desc: Use WeoCEO to manage your Amazon Web Services deployments on EC2 and S3.

Made for the iPhone, provides reviews and prices. Uses iPhone Atom code, Google Ajax Feeds, and CNET. Search lets you enter a product number and get reviews and prices, which is handy when you are in a store like Best Buy.
View service centers in both directions on Highway 401 between Montreal and Toronto. Tourist stops near Highway 401 are included, as well as traffic cameras for Toronto and Montreal.
Click any location on the map to know its elevation.
o.uri.st is a geocoded database of tourist attractions the World over. We have a RESTful API to allow reading and updating of our copyleft data.
Information, news and satellite maps about ski resorts in Canada.
An interactive Digg badge in a one-line JavaScript include. Highly configurable, including discussion topics, popular stories, zoom to view readers, and more.
French real estate, roommate and job mashup.
Allows eBay users to avoid paying delivery charges, by allowing you to see auctions near your location and doing a by-hand delivery.
Consolidates different Web components for college students. Contains Google search, video and local search, local businesses, maps, news feeds, professor searches, local drink specials, and games.
Mashup of the Penn State campus map with Google Maps.  You can search for a building on the map.
Kids party entertainer and venue mashup--aggregates photos, videos and reviews, and helps parents find the right kids entertainment within their budgets.
Review mashup for new Turkish President Mr. Abdullah Gul. You can enter the location where you live and put reviews on the map about Mr. Abdullah Gul.

Best beaches, diving, parks, pictures from the island of Okinawa, Japan.  See virtual images, panoramas, and aerial photographs of places to visit.  Pictures link to reviews, driving directions, maps, and slideshows.
PhoneRevu is a map and list view of Yelp Reviews formated for the iPhone. iPhoneRevu is a Yelp front-end for the iPhone.
Google News Feed Reader for the Apple iPhone.

GCC 2007 allows participants to track their progress on a virtual journey around the globe. The journey is measured by steps, which are tracked on pedometers. The solution manages 161 locations in a CMS to track and zoom between each one.
An auction sharing community where users find, share, and rate interesting eBay auctions.
Racoon The Searcher is search and subscription system that collects information about all government procurement in Russia. In Russian.
Create map riddles for your friends and the world.
Loc Amigos helps you find your friends all over the web. It will match up friends in your address books with their profiles across lots of social networking sites like MySpace, Flickr, and others.
Discover Melbourne Australia with LocalHero, combines local search with an ajax interface. Integrated wiki functionality, or double-click the map to add content.
Feed of the latest stuff from amazon.com with links to Netflix, Blockbuster, or other vendors for rental and purchase.

Customizable widgets that combine maps with photos and points of interest like restaurants, hotels, attractions, and shops for 200 destinations throughout the US, Europe, Canada, Australia, and New Zealand.

yVidster is a social video bookmarking and gallery service. Collect all your videos in one place, share your collections with friends or a large audience, and explore what other people are collecting.
Provides an overview of travel highlights around the world using interactive maps with destinations such as cities, beaches, national parks and cultural sites.

I was thinking about how many places who sell pizza are around me. I put only fresh pizzas cooked in the place, not frozen ones. Three icons: restaurant, stand, shop. I stop this thing to places 500 meters around my house: there are 40, it is weird...

On your WAP capable devices or your PC, simply go to 411Sync.com and use the keyword razorgator to view all the latest tickets available. These tickets may be for sports, converts or events. Purchase hard to get tickets at the last moment.
Find Nissan Dealers in the UK with this mashup.
Levi European store locator.
A mashup for the ancient Roman road Via Claudia Augusta between Konigsbrunn and Epfach in Germany.

This Firefox extension allows you to submit the webpage you are viewing to digg, del.icio.us, Facebook, and other places. It also tells you whether the webpage you are on has been dugg and commented on, and how many times it has been saved on del.icio.us.
Backtags.com provides a social popularity ranking based on bookmarks from a range of leading social bookmarking sites.

GRNDX, the first Green Index. Similar to a stock market index, but it tracks mentions of certain key green phrases in the media. Lets you gauge how much mindshare certain concepts have and see if they are gaining or losing ground compared to last week.
A tourism and venue website. Brings together thousands of audio, video, and PDF files about places to visit in over 20 countries. Uses RSS feeds and Google Maps.
Uses Flickr API to do fun stuff with photos. Home of the fd Flickr Toys.
Best American hospitals for Cancer Treatment as mentioned in US News.
A Google Earth mashup that shows book tours happening around the world.
Search all single-family homes, condos, townhouses, and commercial properties for sale and for rent in Florida. All properties have both information and photos.
A community mashup where people can find ratings, reviews, and videos of the latest mobile phones.
Digg for must-have products and services.
Find garage sales, local estate sales, multi-family yard sales in your area by looking at a map. Plan your trip here by comparing garage sales by location.
The website is always up-to-date with real estate listings from Miami to Maine. The website uses Google Base listings and provides a property location context using Google Maps.
This tool, smitter, will post your Skype Mood Message to Twitter after you change your Skype Mood Message. It also writes to a local file to keep a history of your Skype Mood Messages.
Create your own custom iheart, I Love X, shirts, buttons, and bumper stickers at MyiHeart.com.

Get the latest college football headlines on your mobile phone using SMS, WAP and Email. These headlines are obtained from Rivals.com. Use the keyword rivals followed by the state, i.e. ca, wa, az etc.
Search eBay listings then browse through them in a single page.  Add notes to individual listings for later reference.  Call sellers directly from the web-site by clicking on a button.
Watch your favorite TV shows on tv3o.com. A source for TV shows, photos, episode guides, cast, reviews, community, merchandise, and more.
Search multiple photo sharing sites. Has technology that quantifies colors like red or blue in images, making it possible to show search results by color. Search phrases like: red flower in spring.

Bookmark Cleaner helps you keep you del.icio.us or ma.gnolia.com bookmarks clean. It allows searches: A malware and phishing site search A search for cleaning bookmarks with a particular tag and a search for links that no longer exist, aka 404 not found.
Take a tour on a world map to see all of our pets and their locations.

Used cars and new car shopping site with extensive use of APIs. Yahoo Map Image is used to get around the https issue with Google Maps. YouTube drives the video search. Users can leave a car review, an article, or a dealer review.

Twitter mashed-up with Del.icio.us & Ma.gnolia.com. When you are viewing your or a friends timeline, you have the option to clip the tweet. This saves the tweet URL tweet in your bookmark account as a private link with a specific tag so you view it later.
Mashup satellite images from BBC Weather and t7online. See the Instructions tab to see how to do it.

Maps restaurants in Toronto. Use check boxes below the map to select from Indian, Chinese, Sushi, and so on, and then click the Show Selection button to map the restaurants of those types. Click a location to view a short description.
Stockaholic uses the EditGrid dynamic images to mashup charts from Yahoo Finance. See the Instructions tab to see how to do it.
Create your own slideshow and let it run on your Netvibes homepage. Numerous styles and effects available. Go to imageloop.com, upload your photos, and fetch your Slideshow-URL.

Zuckerbucks are points that you can use like play money on Facebook. They have no cash value, but you can send them to friends as gifts, or as payment. You can also bid on real products featured within the Zuckerbucks app.

Virtualtraveller aims to supply the user relevant information about some location on earth of his/her choosing. To accomplish this, this site makes heavy use of various web services and data including Wikipedia, Google, Flickr and Youtube.
Weather and climate information for Africa visualized on Google Maps.
A Google Maps view of the 50 most expensive cities in the world as surveyed by Mercer Human Resource Consulting.
New 7 Wonders of the world mapped on Google Maps along with YouTube video for each of the 7 wonder.

CoverSlide helps track down lost cover art for mp3s, movies, books, and video games.  Ruby on Rails and Ajax make it convenient to select from a vast amount of cover art thumbnails to choose the perfect one without leaving the page.
Track recent visitors to your website or blog - embed on your iGoogle page or on your website or blog.
Maps Hindu temples around the globe. Users can login and share temple information or click a temple to learn more about it.
Stoopsales.com lets you find, list and save a stoop sales in Brooklyn NY.
Get the latest headlines, gossip and rumors from People Magazine on your cell phone using SMS, WAP and Email. Use the keyword people and get the content within seconds.
Listen to Pandora online radio on your iGoogle page.
BmyKey is a French real estate, immobilier, mashup. With BmyKey.com, you can easily find a property in France.
Storefront built on Amazon eCommerce with millions of products from a wide variety of categories and hundreds of merchants with competitive prices.
Skype social network mashup.
360 degree panoramas from around the Republic of Singapore, linked to a Google map of Singapore. Local information about each location appears, forming a virtual tour.
Site combines the Ning.com platform with Ether.com to create a site where interpreters can find work.

Lovers of WOXY and DRM-free MP3 download site eMusic now have this mashup of the 2 popular sites. As the WOXY music stream plays, the track playing shows up for download from eMusic with info about the band, album reviews, related artists, etc.

Find user-generated cell phone signals by major service providers. Find dead spots, and compare signal strengths. Add your own signal, it only takes 15 seconds, helps the map grow more valuable for cell phone users.

MoreMap is a Google Maps Mashup which allows users to track packages, find radio stations, local banks, movie theaters with up to the minute show times, track earthquakes, view interesting places, save places, and get directions.
Rich video aggregration site. Videos from blip.tv, Break.com, DailyMotion, Google Videos, Kewego, MetaCafe, MySpace, Veoh.com, YouTube all in one place.
bliin lets you share your location and geo-tagged photos from your handset in real-time. You can find and follow your friends across the world and share experiences via your phone and over the web.

Lovers of KCRW radio and DRM-free MP3 download site eMusic now have this mashup of the 2 popular sites. As the KCRW music stream plays, the track playing shows up for download from eMusic with info about the band, album reviews, related artists, etc.

Lovers of Pandora and DRM-free MP3 download site eMusic now have a mashup of the 2 popular sites. As the Pandora stream plays, the track playing shows up for download from eMusic with info about the band, album reviews, related artists, etc.

Lovers of KEXP radio and DRM-free MP3 download site eMusic now have this mashup of the 2 popular sites. As the live KEXP stream plays, the track playing shows up for download from eMusic with info about the band, album reviews, related artists, etc.
See which states have the biggest differences between students passing their state tests versus the national tests in math and reading. Uses data reported in Time magazine.
YouTube search engine with results in RSS or JSON.
rdiff.gov.uk list of 10,000 businesses in Cardiff plotted onto a map of the city grouped by business type.

A mashup that picks up the tags of a stumbleupon user and links them to the latest blog, bookmark and photo entries by Technorati, del.icio.us and Flickr. If you have a SU account try it out, and if not, you can always try with other SU user names.
Mashup of Jaiku and Google Maps. See what different people are doing and saying around the world.
Videos, photos, and panorama of Chile that helps tourists or others find restaurants, points of interest, banks, gas stations, and more in Chile.

Developed as an add-on to the search engine, Molu, enter a city and then view it mapped, along with Flickr photos, Wikipedia entries, weather, YouTube videos, and more about the location. Print the image on a custom goodie.
The real estate portal of Dubai.
App lets you add random jokes to your Facebook Profile. Jokes come from a Google API-based site.
Six-player game of tag on Google Earth.
Free carpool matching service based on home location and work location.

Google map of TB patient Andrew Speaker's journey across the Atlantic.

p.movin360 shows a trip through the city of Berlin. The panoramic movie is synchronized to GoogleMaps. During the virtual tour, you can move the camera around. Get further information and view related photos.

mashup_name: Shopping.com API 3 Demo for All Markets
mashup_desc: This site is a demo to show the functionality of the Shopping.com API version 3. Includes all local US,UK,DE,FR,AU.
A shopping mashup using Amazon API along with product databases and Google Maps.
Map service for finding photos, videos, news stories, wiki articles, blogs, hotels, flights, events, and anything else we can about your world.
Always updated geo-targeted web programming jobs. Neatly organized data from Indeed.com.
A simple site that uses the Flickr API to download pictures for an entered user and view them on a larger scale.
A plotting library that allows you to draw arbitrary data as node graphs. Stunning visualization software for practical uses. It outputs svg and png images and has an interactive editor.

Web widgets that display Amazon items and earn referral revenue through Amazon Associates. Browser is an Amazon mini browser. List displays wish lists, baby and wedding registries, List Mania lists.
Latest and Greatest shows bestsellers and new releases.

Verkoops.com is a search engine for classified ads. You can search products, jobs, housing, and more using a novel faceted search interface. Verkoops.com allows users to search by keywords or use a dynamic navigation control.
uchR.de is a German mapping mashup about tags and places. If you register and log in, you can add places, points, to create and document your maps.
Doubletab.com is a mashup of the YouTube and LiveVideo APIs.

Who is Digging You Lets you see, literally, who is digging you on Digg.com. It works best when the Digg user has set up a profile picture otherwise you get the anonymous coward picture. Popfly account required.

Map search to locate Recycling Centers and a guide to recycling from home. There is also a store to shop for recycling stuff.

Sunday Morning Rides is an interactive community portal for motorcycle riders to access, explore, plan, and share motorcycle tracks via a ride mapping system that combines GPS, geographic information systems, database, and Google mapping technologies.
A categorized list of free educational resources with integrated Google Ajax Search.
Sighting UFO reports as they happen. In 3D.
krvision, the popular Flickr watching service, is now available in 3D, thanks to the Poly9 FreeEarth API.
Inspiring visions of earth from around the 3D globe.
A site that aims to make it easier to decide what movies you can watch with your friends.
Your house on the 3D moon.
ShutterPoint Image Upload API Demo mashup is based on their API and shows a sample HTML form to interact with the API.

mashup_name: Easy One Loan and Home Values
mashup_desc: Mashup of Zillow and Yahoo Maps as supplement to online mortgage service.

Search for tickets on Oodle real time on the go using SMS, WAP or Email. Use the keyword oodlet followed by what category tickets you are looking for and the zip code. Within seconds, get a list of all the available tickets.
Site with semi-random set of trivia for media including del.icio.us bookmark counts and Amazon sales rank graph in the latest week.

Mashes up user posted deals from forums like slickdeals, fatwallet, gottadeal, and uses a popularity algorithm to identify the hottest deals.  Also mashes deals into its shop.dealighted.com engine to show relevant deals alongside retail product prices.

CyclistNexus is an online cycling community, offering cyclists the opportunity to find, map and share routes, connect with local cyclists, find and form new riding groups, and manage cycling related activities.
A local place based travel site with photos, videos, reviews, itinerary, ask and social networking functions.
Map Runner is a collection of runners routes, created by users.

Fleetflow is a web based fleet management service. It provides access to near realtime asset state data, two-way text messaging, mapping, geo-encoding and other tools which aid in the management of fixed and mobile assets.

mashup_name: Walking the world in a straight line
mashup_desc: Imagine where you pass if you take a long walk in a straight line around the world, which places you gonna pass. What kind of people you gonna know. This mashup answers that questions.

Use Google Maps interface to search for images of the China Brazil Earth Resources Satellites (CBERS 2 and 2b). The images cover  all South America. Images are a free download to any computer in Brazil.

mashup_name: ChizMax Lyrics and Video Search Engine
mashup_desc: This is combination of Lyrics search and video. When song is found on the lyrics database, it fetches the video from YouTube.

.placebetween.us aims to simplify the task of finding a place to meet your friends. Provide your addresses and the type of place you want to meet at, such as coffee, diner, or movie and a.placebetween.us does the rest.
New desktop tool for uploading images to ImageLoop. See link on homepage to download .zip file.

mashup_name: One Hit Wonders on Google Maps
mashup_desc: One Hit Wonders from Forbes, Wikipedia and American Idol are mapped. Also includes videos from YouTube for many entries.
A mashup of geographic information and Google Maps.

mashup_name: Where a Bill becomes a Law
mashup_desc: A fun and educational way to track the status of U.S. legislation, highlighting the actual locations where law gets made.
Yahoo traffic data mapped on Google Maps. Includes weather from worldweather.org.
A Firefox and Internet Explorer 7 extension that adds split-screen previews, deadlink checking and hotkeys to Google, Technorati, Ask and Live searches.

At Sea Scotia Vacation Rentals we want you to have the Nova Scotia Vacation of a lifetime. We have some of the finest Nova Scotia Cottages and Nova Scotia Vacation rentals.  All locations are listed on the map.
Digital marketplace using modified BitTorrent network for distribution.  Allows sellers to list their items, and Buyers to get paid for helping distribute.
Monitor top selling video games by console using Amazon sales data. Add lists to your iGoogle home page.
Use this map to find tennis jobs throughout the US. The site uses the Google Maps mashed with the Indeed.com job database. First 50 matching tennis related jobs are displayed on the map.
Winner of the Sunlight Foundation Mashup Congress Contest. Get more insight into the truth of campaign finance with this interactive network maps of state level political contribution data.
Latest product information aggregated from Buy.com and Amazon.com. Updated through RSS Syndication.
Yet another web2.0 travel application that helps you find the holiday rentals. Most are located in France and Italy.
Search for videos through Google.
Site aggregating breaking science, technology news and colorful commentary every few minutes.
Breaking news in pictures every few minutes. Featured stories are ripped from the headlines, using Netvibes UWA.
All of preciseNews for Flash RSS users with SpringWidgets.
Breaking news and colorful commentary every few minutes, 24-7.

A site that generates code to embed maps created using the My Maps service of Google into websites and blogs. A range of style and presentation options are available to customize map appearance. Users can share maps they create in the library of maps.
Visits famous places through Virtual Earth and Google Maps.  See Related Flickr photos.

Turtilla is an online service which allows you to search and filter content related to your interests. This content is captured from a large variety of sources. The generated results can be converted to an RSS feed.
Just enter your favorite musical artist and discover all related artists. It has never been easier to find good bands. Youtube videos and amazon links included.

Demonstrates the workaround provided by Yahoo for using Maps in Flex 2.  Uses some sample code as base and adds some simple features like plotting geoRSS, regular RSS, and traffic and weather by zip code.
Uses Yahoo Search and del.icio.us to search for articles on Wikipedia, show them inline and allow instant bookmarking. Tutorial on how this was built at kentbrewster.com

Giveness is a social network for philanthropy.  Charities can create their own communities to connect with their supporters and fundraise online.  When a user purchases a product through Giveness, 100 percent of the commissions generated will be donated.

Multi-Search uses Pipes, BBC News, Yahoo Search and Term Extraction APIs, and the Google Blog Search. We start with BBC news stories and excerpts, gather terms, find blog entries through Google, and then guess the feed URL using Yahoo Search.

Mashing up the Google Feed API and Windows Live Search for isfeed: access to RSS files, this provides a river of news reading experience for recent posts around any keyword.

Gridmarker.com is a free place to store, share, view, and search for your favorite locations in Second Life. You can also find new places to explore by viewing and searching favorite locations of other users.
An interesting way to look at real estate in the UK.
Uses Technorati and Feedburner APIs to rank Philippine blogs.
Track the current status of all MLB games with a single keyword. Simply use SMS or WAP and use keyword scoresmlb.
Dutch mashup combining Maps with demographic information.
WeddingWire uses GoogleMaps to mashup thousands of wedding vendors locations such as florists, photographers, DJs, etc. in the US.

Spotstory is a place where people can share and discover interesting, but often overlooked, locations.  Spotstory can be thought of as wiki for place, combined with mapping, photo sharing, social networking, and more.
View radar and cloud cover superimposed on an animated Virtual Earth map. Adjust the degree of transparency for the weather data to see more or less of the underlying map.
After you have logged in to MapYourBuddies, this mashup will display your friends from Facebook on a Google Map and give gift recommendations from Amazon based on your friends favorite music.
MyBikramYoga.com is dedicated in bringing you the latest in the Bikram yoga community, news, blogs, images and videos.
A stylish mashup that helps you find information on gas prices, movies, restaurants, traffic, local events, WiFi locations, driving directions, and more on a Virtual Earth map.
Zimride is a carpool and rideshare matching website that uses Facebook profiles and geocoded addresses.  Imagine the possibilities.
Price comparison shopping with experts advice.
This mashup combines great motorcycling routes on a map along with route information, trip length, and locations of nearest H-D dealerships and Best Western Hotels.
Dutch mashup that superimposes carnival parade routes on a Virtual Earth map.
Display crisis hotspots on a world map and retrieve latest news on each crisis from Reuters.
Real-time visualizations of the stream of information flowing into Flickr. View photos, tags or buddy icons as they are active on the site.
Memory game that chooses Flickr pictures as cards, based on a tag you enter.

Phrasr is an interactive web based application that uses Flickr images to illustrate the phrases that users submit. You can choose every image and then publish the entire phrase, which is shown as a personal slide show.

The goal of Zoomap is to populate maps with user images. Add any image on any place in the world and leave a message in a text bubble. Everything on the map can be viewed by other users, the images can be reused and you can send the location by email.
Yellow-page listings with points-of-interest data plotted on a map.
Displays a blog owners next Meetup.com event, and the number of Yes and Maybe responses received so far.
Schedule SMS reminders for events up to 18 months in advance.
Find bargains on Amazon.com. Find items by highest percentage off, popularity, rating and bargains.
Video surveillance system allowing you to monitor and broadcast images of your home or office to the Internet or a mobile phone.

mashup_name: Judys Book meets Better Business Bureau
mashup_desc: New and improved mashup of Judys Book local search and the Better Bureau Search websites for more than 20 major metropolitan areas and a number of states and locales.
Send and receive SMS text messages from Microsoft Outlook. Get Outlook appointment reminders and important messages forwarded to your phone.
Mashup of the local search site Judys Book with Denver-area Better Business Bureau business lookups and a search within the city contractor database for a valid contractor license.
See Amazon.com customer reviews and editorials within the online card catalog of the Boulder, Colo., public library.
Motorcycle roads, routes and rides, with interactive road maps and scenic photography.
Synchronize Microsoft Outlook and Google Calendar with this Windows utility. Requires .Net 2.0 and Outlook 2003 or higher.
Google News Bar gadget (based on Google AJAX search API) can be added to your Google home page. Add the search terms of your interest and view them as vertical or horizontal newsbars.

Mashup of the Citysearch.com local search and review site with the Denver restaurant health inspections database. See health code violations and past inspections directly on a restaurant listing page.

mashup_desc: See health code violations and past inspections directly on a restaurant listing page.

Draws musical scales on a virtual fretboard. Uses the FUTEF API to get scale information from Wikipedia.
User-edited search results for health, beauty and fashion sites plus blog, friends, reviews and contests.
Wide collection of Arabic media including TV, radio, movies and clips.
Like tinyurl, but for maps. Create a map, add routes or points of interest, and get a short URL to share it or come back to it later.

Using carpark information and map information from OneMotoring.com.sg and Google Maps respectively, users can have a birds-eye view of all the parking costs in Singapore.

Visualize the differences in average list prices and search popularity for any city or county in the US. Enter any two cities or counties and a graph showing the popularity will display.
Get graphical answers to lots of interesting questions based on real estate pricing data with this nicely done Trulia mashup.
See the real estate listings of Singapore with this Google maps mashup.
Users from Germany, Austria and Great Britain can swap used DVDs, CDs, Books and Games. On the mashup map they can check out where their swap partners come from.
See upcoming events from the Microsoft Developer Network, MSDN, on this Google Map.
Grabs data from Google base and allows you to search, sort and plot records on a chart, map, and calendar.

mashup_desc: Technorati Search sucks in a Technorati search feed for the query of your choice and hands back a JSON object via Yahoo Pipes, ready to insert inline via the usual methods. With implementation details and source code.

mashup_desc: A guide for Red Sox fans visiting Ft Myers, Florida for spring training. Created with the Atlas mapping tool. Fans can plot photos on a satellite image of City of Palms Park and comment on businesses found via Google Local Search.

A simple mashup of Google maps and upcoming.org events.  It is complete with tag clouds, tag searches and city searches.

Currently SF bay area events are subscribed, it is trivial to scan other cities too.
A mashup of Google Maps and Flickr. Double click on a country marker to see popular Flickr photos using a simple Ajax interface. Also includes quick links to Wikipedia entries for each country.

View photos of Dallas Mavericks on your WAP-capable phone. Via 411Sync and the keyword dalphotos.

Follow high school recruits as they choose which Division 1 college football team will get their commitment. View recruiting information by state, or university, as well as viewing recruits within a 100 mile radius of your zip.
Free property listings for rentals and home sales around the world.
A Chinese wiki service based on Google Maps.
Community networking site that allows members to get in touch with their neighbours. The site uses APIs from Nestoria, flickr, Eventful and more to provide local information to users.

hipoqih.com is a system composed of a Web and plugin for mobile devices that allow recording warnings and URL associated to any geopoint in the planet. These warnings can be show automatically in terminals with the plugin when approaching that geopoint.
The adventure sports route diagrams search engine for rock and ice climbing, caving, canyoning, hiking, skiing, snowshoeing, mountain biking, via ferrata.
Mosoto is a new way to share and connect with your Facebook friends. With Mosoto you can share files, chat with friends and discover people and media in your social network. Social streaming media.
Maps and descriptions of skateparks for skateboarding and biking in europe. User contributed content.

For those who like to be inspired by random delicious bookmarks.

Malta hotels with integrated map of YouTube videos.
